name: Gladiators Arena
description: It’s time to attack! Train your troops, upgrade weapons, It’s time to battle it out on the world’s biggest ancient arena. Gather your troops and enter the battlefield. Let’s give our audience one heck of a show!

name: Flash Party: Deluxe Edition
description: Get 10 heroes and extra props. A luxurious and valuable upgrade! Content included： Heroes - Macalon, Seaya, Heracles, Cupid, Sandy, Magician, Tina, Chilli, Kamiki Yuri, Mr.5

name: Flash Party: Fighting Master Edition
description: Get 15 heroes including crossovers and massive props. The ultimate upgrade! Content included: Heroes - Macalon, Seaya, Heracles, Cupid, Sandy, Magician, Tina, Chilli, Kamiki Yuri, Mr.5, Derek, Lan, Tong, Thanatos Crossover Hero - Tarara

name: Flash Party: Starter Edition
description: Get 5 entry-level heroes covering all the fighting styles! Content included: Heroes -Macalon, Seaya, Heracles, Cupid, Sandy.

name: Pixel Paint 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Green New Deal Simulator
description: Achieve zero emissions and full employment in this casual card-driven game.

name: Idle Ant Colony
description: This little idle tycoon game is all about building your own anthill and creating new colonies in different territories. Provide for your ant queen, hatch thousands of workers and establish ant trails to gather food and resources to further your idle ant colony!

name: Crush the Monsters: Foul Puzzle
description: Make mincemeat out of monsters! In this action puzzle game, you can destroy a variety of monsters in many different ways — blow them up with cannon fire, incinerate them, smash them, chop, saw or tear them to pieces (and that’s not nearly all!) And if regular monsters are too simple for your tastes, test your mettle against the epic bosses of the Underworld!

name: Breaker Fun: Rescue Adventure
description: Classic bricks and balls free puzzle games meet rescue adventure! Aim and crush all the bricks and obstacles to brick out the trap and save the man!

name: Andy Volcano: Tile Match Story
description: Swap office drudgery for exotic adventure and mystery in this fun puzzle game. Match 3 tiles to clear the board and progress through the exciting story. If you like adventure games with intrigue, humor and challenging puzzles, you’re bound to fall in love with Andy Volcano!

name: Save the Goosey
description:
Because of an accident, Goosey's home has encountered an unimaginable crisis! Thousands of enemies are coming!

In order to survive, you have no choice but to take on the great responsibility of saving the race - take up arms and join the battle, you will bring hope to the goose family!

Fight against hordes of enemies, eliminate monsters, and complete challenges as a brave man! Make your choice, choose the right weapon for you, let your strength grow, and fight against the tide of monsters! Finally find the way to survive!

Improve your skills and become a warrior with unlimited potential. Survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your agonizing struggle, using the resources gained to develop your potential!

This title was delisted from Google Play on April 23, 2023.

name: Space Leaper: Reboot
description:
A rich roguelike experience with lots of strategic team options!
Simple placement gameplay combined with a deeply strategic system that includes type advantages and character skill combos. Assemble your strongest, cutest team and conquer the stars to rebuild your home!

name: Soul Launcher!: Tower Defense
description: In Soul World, monsters are tormenting citizens in every corner! The citizens cannot resist the powerful force of the monsters! However, where there is darkness, there is also light.

name: Just Find It
description: Put your observation skills to the test in Just Find the Difference!

name: Hell of a Racket
description:
Play as a fallen angel seeking redemption by punishing satanic worshipers who don't play the holiest of sports....tennis! Use your blessed racket to wreak havoc and show these satanic practices have no standing in God's land!

Hell of a Racket is a unique twist on an old-school genre: First-Person Shooter? No. First-Person Swinger! Engage with enemies in a unique way by reflecting projectiles at them with your racket or simply smacking them! Jump, dash, run, or wall-climb your way around the arena and kill your enemies as you work your way to the final boss: Pickle Ball Satan!

name: Idle Dragon Clicker
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Infected Backrooms
description: Enter the surreal world of Backrooms in our multiplayer 2-8 players Co-Op & PvP game. Become monsters or survivors, where players must infect others or use their guns to stay alive. With fast-paced gameplay and a creepy atmosphere, it's perfect for Backrooms fans for having fun with friends

name: Final Fantasy X-2: Last Mission
description: Final Fantasy X-2: Last Mission is a playable sequel to Final Fantasy X-2, originally released exclusively in Japan as a bonus for Final Fantasy X-2: International + Last Mission for the PlayStation 2 on February 9, 2004. It is included in Final Fantasy X/X-2 HD Remaster, making it available for English speakers for the first time on March 18, 2014.

name: Persona 3: The Answer
description:
The Answer, also known as Episode Aegis in the Japanese version, is an epilogue of Persona 3. As The Answer is a continuation of the story of Persona 3, it is recommended to play The Journey first. Furthermore, the content of this extra scenario is mainly combat oriented and does not involve any daily life or Social Link mechanics.

The chapter is only available in one difficulty setting, which is supposed to be on par with Persona 3's Hard mode. The gameplay is approximately 30 hours long and has Aigis be the playable character in place of the protagonist. The story follows SEES on a new adventure involving a new dungeon, Abyss of Time, which has locked SEES in an infinite time loop within the dormitory. It also introduces a new party member named Metis, a robotic AI similar to Aigis.

name: Afro Santa
description: Sin descripción

name: Sparkling Truffle
description: Sin descripción

name: Crashing Party
description: The player controls a marble and must push off all other marbles from the stage. The marbles feature Sonic's face and levitating hands.

name: Dance Party
description: A Snake-like game where the player controls a girl, and must group together people on the dance floor to form a line behind her.

name: Dancing Challenge
description: The Dance Dance Resolution clone seen on the DDR consoles. The game steals countless actual songs from well-known artists (not cover versions), with their music videos playing in the background. It is divided into two modes: "MTV Mode" (featuring more general music, and using the MTV logo), and "Cartoon Mode" (which seems to solely feature Hatsune Miku songs). ["DDR" hardware only]

name: Delicious Foods
description: A camera-based game, where the sensor will place giant cartoon lips over the player's actual mouth. The player must move their mouth to eat the happy food, while avoiding eating garlic. ["DDR" hardware only]

name: Friends: Always Stick Together
description: A direct clone of the Adobe Flash game of the same name, with identical graphics. An action game where the tortoise and hare team up with each other.

name: Fruit
description: A Fruit Ninja clone. The regular "Fruit" version is for standard controllers, while the Super Fruit version uses the camera sensor.

name: Invincible Little Warrior
description: A Super Qix clone. The background artwork for level 1 is taken from One Piece, while level 2 uses Doraemon.

name: Ping Pong
description: Direct clone of Cube Technology's 8-bit ping pong game, with the same options ("Knocks Exercise" and "Smash Exercise") and even the same song (Robert Miles' "Fable") on the title screen.

name: Poket Man
description: An original Pokémon-themed game, somewhat similar to Breakout. The player controls Pikachu, who must throw balls upward to hit the numbered blocks; the numbers dictate the amount of hits needed. The blocks will shift downward if not destroyed; the game is over if the blocks reach the bottom of the screen.

name: Commando
description: A Contra-style game. It is VT03 only.

name: Trinity Trigger: Extra Episode - Cyan
description: Sin descripción

name: Trinity Trigger: Extra Episode - Elise
description: Sin descripción

name: Trinity Trigger: Extra Episode - Zantis
description: Sin descripción

name: Trinity Trigger: Extra Episode - Violet
description: Sin descripción

name: Fishing
description: A fishing game, featuring two unique gameplay modes - Freedom and King Fish. Many advanced options are available, such as changing the location or time of day.

name: Stellaris: Galactic Paragons
description: Add Galactic Paragons to your empires and experience a new level of character and story as great leaders follow your lead to the stars. With exclusive additions to the all-new Council mechanic, leaders who you can shape to amplify the vision for your empire, new civics and more.

name: Frontline Gallop
description: This is a scrolling, top-down war game. You control a tank armed with soldiers, and must shoot enemy tanks and bases while also strategically releasing your soldiers so they can attack.

name: Justice
description: A clone of the Batman NES game. The player controls a character resembling the Green Lantern; beating enemies up, collecting power-ups and jumping on platforms to complete the level. Also called Thunder Man (VT03).

name: Metal Slug Advance
description: An unauthorized adaption of the Game Boy Advance version of Metal Slug.

name: Pet Dog
description: A virtual pet game where you must raise one of three puppies, likely released amidst the Nintendogs craze. A Chinese-language version was released as a Nanjing cartridge, which contains a battery to save progress; an English version was included on several plug & plays, but it cannot save progress.

name: Pikachu
description: Also referred to as "Pikachu5", Pikachu is a Pokémon-themed platforming-adventure game. The player controls five characters, each of which have different abilities: Pikachu can shoot, Nuzleaf can climb, Combusken can fly, Marshtomp can swim, and Hariyama can punch. The player must use a combination of said abilities in attempt to find a key hidden in the stage; when it is found, a locked door is opened, where the player has to fight a boss. The game uses music from Devil World, and graphics from Super Mario Bros. 2 and Bubble Bobble 2.

name: Crash Bandicoot
description: Crash Bandicoot is a Famicom platformer developed and published by Nice Code Software. It was released on an unknown date likely from 2007 or later.

name: Racing Guy
description: One of Nice Code's earliest titles. The player must build one of four toy cars by installing preset parts onto it; after this, they can compete in "Power" (a game of Tug-of-War with two cars), "Championship" (a "race" that literally does nothing and controls itself), and "Distance" (inexplicably, a hack of Javelin Throw from Track & Field).

name: Wait and See!
description:
Wait and See! is a platform game developed by Dragon Co.. The game has Nu, pogodi! (Ну, погоди!, a famous Russian series of theatrical shorts similar to American series, Tom and Jerry) as an alternate title; however, apart from this and one of the cartridge labels, it has nothing to do with the actual cartoon.

The phrase "Nu, pogodi!" is more closely translated as "Well, Just you wait!" instead of "Wait and see!".

Bugs Bunny is featured in the title screen, despite that there's no references to Looney Tunes in the entire game.

name: Angry Birds
description: Angry Birds, also known as Angry Bird 3, is a pirated game for the Famicom based off of the mobile game. While the developer is unknown, it was most likely made by Nice Code.

name: Mario Kart
description: A F1 Race hack that changes the three courses to Mushroom, Flower, and Lightning Cup and allows the player to play as either Mario or Luigi. The graphics are used from Super Mario Kart, Mario Kart Super Circuit, and Mario Kart 7 (with a lower resolution and fewer colors). The game only appears on the Famiclone system Family Karaoto.

name: Magic Jony
description: Magic Jony is an unlicensed game developed by Nice Code Software.

name: Poke Tetris
description: Poke Tetris (also known as Pikachu) is a bootleg Tetris clone featuring Pikachu, made for the Famicom by an unknown developer sometime in the early 2000's.

name: Brain Games
description: A series of very basic, semi-educational titles, which feature what appears to be Nature Clan in them (albeit a fairly loose adaption). Titles include: Rudder (pictured), Addition, Build Pillars, Counting, Crystals, Fruit Logic, Numbers, and Salver Balance.

name: Escapeway
description:
Escapeway is a game in the Nature Clan series, developed by Nice Code.

Three Nature Clans are on top of each other, and their goal is to jump over objects, such as bombs, in every level.

name: Experiment
description: A gameplay clone of Bug Catcher, except that it stars Nature Clan, and it takes place in a science lab. It is the only VT03-exclusive, and likely the final Nature Clan title, ever released.

name: Forest Adventure
description: A generic 2D platformer where Nature Clan must reach the end goal.

name: Island
description: Nature Clan: Island, otherwise simply known as Island, is an installment of the Nature Clan series. Its hardware is VT02 (Famicom), like with every other Nature Clan title.

name: Mirror Devil World
description: Nature Clan: Mirror Devil World, otherwise simply known as Devil World, is a game in the Nature Clan series. Its hardware is based on VT02/Famicom, and it is a clone of Kickle Cubicle.

name: Pindable Crystal Ball
description:
Nature Clan: Pindable Crystal Ball, or simply known as Pindable Crystal Ball, is a game in the Nature Clan series. Its hardware is based on the Famicom/VT02. As with other titles in the series, Pindable Crystal Ball was designed for inclusion on plug-'n-play systems.

Pindale Crystal Ball has a VT03 port called Worm Dream, which stars a worm instead of Nature Clan.

name: Sky Dreamer
description:
Sky Dreamer is a game in the Nature Clan series, developed by Nice Code. It also has a VT03 variant, with entirely different music and graphics, but the main goal is the same.
Sky Dreamer runs on a similar engine to Dragon Co.'s games, and the background music is a rendition of the Pitfall II theme.

name: Spring World
description: Nature Clan: Spring World, otherwise simply known as Spring World, is a game in the Nature Clan series. It was designed for inclusion on plug'n'plays, and its hardware is based on VT02/Famicom.

name: Mais qui est le vrai Roro?
description:
Enter the wacky and crazy world of "Mais qui est le vrai Roro?" - an exciting game of hide-and-seek that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very last second! But beware, this time you're facing off against your Twitch community in a fierce battle to uncover the true Roro.

Take on the role of the famous streamer and podcaster Roro, who must complete his daily tasks in his apartment invaded by fake Roros. Among them, you'll find racing Roros, an adorable cat named Fluffy, and even the expert in decoration, Marc-Emmanuel!

At the end of each round, your audience must vote to determine who the real Roro is. Each completed or failed task will eliminate fake Roros or unlock powers to muddy the waters!

So, are you ready to take on the challenge and prove to your community that you're the master of the game? Play "Mais qui est le vrai Roro?" now and find out if you're the best Twitch detective!

name: RoboSquad Revolution
description: Welcome to the Revolution, where you are an insurgent robot marching to the beat of your own motherboard in the name of rebellion. Level up your components and rewrite the future of AI, one Hologram Throwdown at a time. Well what are you waiting for, metalhead? Join a squad for free today!

name: 101 Dalmatians
description: 101 Dalmatians is a pirate SNES hack of Beethoven: The Ultimate Canine Caper, aka Beethoven's 2nd, made by Twin Eagles Group. This hack was released in February 1998.

name: 1990 Super Bros. 4
description:
1990 Super Bros. 4 is a hack of the Japanese Super Mario Bros. 2 (a.k.a. The Lost Levels).

The game is largely identical to the Japanese version of Super Mario Bros. 2. Aside from an edited title screen, some of the graphics were changed; the graphics were reused from Super Mario Bros. 3, although some sprites are custom. Some of the power-ups have a different use: a Super Mushroom turns Mario into Fire Mario, and a Starman allows Mario to swim in the air.

name: 16 Tiles Mahjong
description: 16 Tiles Mahjong is a unlicensed adult Mahjong game made by Gamtec for Sega Genesis in 1992.

name: Street Dance
description: Street Dance is a DDR style music game and a revised version of Inventor's game of the same name. The title screen was taken from the Music Video of Venga Boys' Boom! Boom! Boom! Boom! The 2008 version uses Avilon sound engine (same as in Sharp X68000 games) instead of Sunsoft sound engine used in first version of the game to play PCM music.

name: Hit Mouse
description: Hit Mouse is a basic whack-a-mole style game featuring three enemy types; blue mice, purple mice and grass. the game is controlled with the D-Pad and each stage lasts for 60 seconds.

name: 2-in-1 Street Dance + Hit Mouse
description: 2-in-1 Street Dance + Hit Mouse is a pirate multicart for the Famicom, distributed in 2008. It was bundled with a dance mat.

name: Duck
description: Duck (Chinese: 醜小鴨, a literal translation meaning Ugly Duck, also known as Duck Maze) is an unlicensed clone of Doki Doki Penguin Land, made for the Famicom in 1987 by Bit Corp. and released in Taiwan, Australia and Brazil by Bit Corp., HES and Dismac respectively.

name: Fire Dragon
description:
Fire Dragon is an unlicensed snake clone released on multiple systems by multiple companies.

Fire Dragon was released on the Famicom in the early 90s. It was developed by Gamtec. It was released by BIC and likely Gamtec or a related company in other countries.

In 1993 a Mega Drive version of the game was released by Songtly and Jumbo. On the box this version is called Lóng Xíng Tiān Xià, on its title screen it is just called Lóng, and on a splash screen that appears when the game is booted up, it is called Link Dragon. This version features new music and a music test option.

A Gameboy version was also released. This version appears most similar to the Mega Drive version. In an early build of the game found on Vast Fame's multicarts it is called Lóng Xíng Tiān Xià on the title screen. It would later on be published by Gowin as Guā Guā Huǒ Lóng. In situations where an English name is displayed it is referred to as Fire Dragon. This version features the same music as the Mega Drive version, but lacks a music test option.

name: Fire Dragon
description:
Fire Dragon was released on the Famicom in the early 90s.

A Game Boy version was also released. This version appears most similar to the Mega Drive version. In an early build of the game found on Vast Fame's multicarts it is called Lóng Xíng Tiān Xià on the title screen. It would later on be published by Gowin as Guā Guā Huǒ Lóng. In situations where an English name is displayed it is referred to as Fire Dragon. This version features the same music as the Mega Drive version, but lacks a music test option.

name: Jump Skunk
description: Jump Skunk is an exciting one-minute runner game with new stages available every day! Challenge your friends and compete for the world record as you jump and glide to avoid spikes and reach the picnic. With one-minute stages and instant load times, you always have time for one more try! Download now and experience the thrill of Jump Skunk on your android device.

name: Tom & Jerry 3
description: Tom & Jerry 3 is an unlicensed port of Tom & Jerry: Frantic Antics released for the Famicom by Dragon Co. at an unknown date based on the cartoon shorts of the same name.

name: Twin Eagle
description: Twin Eagle (雙鷹 in Chinese) is a horizontal shooter developed by Joy Van in 1989. Despite the name, this game has nothing to do with the Seta game Twin Eagle (which actually received an official port to the system from Romstar).

name: 3 in 1 Supergun
description:
3 in 1 Supergun is a compilation of light gun games, developed by Chengdu Tai Jing Da Dong Computer Co and published by Micro Genius, which was released in Asia and Italy in 1993.

This multicart contains three games, of which require a zapper to play. Oddly, all 3 games start up with a menu reading "Gun Fighter" on the top and with the option of selecting 3 difficulties.

At least two versions of this multicart are known to exist, with the other version(s) fixing the spelling of "Clown" on the menu and adding 3 (non-zapper) games; one dumped variant adds F15 City War, Poke Block and Volleyball.

developers.name: Chengdu Tai Jing Da Dong Computer Co

name: Spiderman 2
description: Spiderman 2 for the Famicom is a hack of Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom which changes all appearances of Ryu into Spider-Man. The game removes all traces of Tecmo's name on it and starts on the 2nd level of the game.

name: Digit Monster II
description:
Digit Monster II, also known as Digi Monster II (also sometimes called "Digimon" when included in multicarts) is a hack of Urusei Yatsura: Lum's Wedding Bell. In some versions, the music is slowed down.

The title screen has a strange, demonic-looking unofficial art version of Veemon from the Digimon series, and has the title "Digi Monster II". It also has two shooting stars and two options below in a box; 1 Player and 2 Players.

name: Muzzle Run
description:
Greyhounds are running on the Polygon Blockchain!
Breed, train, and race to win money on your way to podium glory with your NFT Greyhound collection.

name: 777 Lucky Bingo
description: 777 Lucky Bingo (777 幸運輪盤) is a simple slot machine simulator made by Sachen in 1989.

name: AV Jiu Ji Ma Jiang II
description: AV Jiu Ji Ma Jiang II (AV究極麻將2), also known as AV Kyuukyoku Mahjong 2 is an adult versus Mahjong game developed by Hummer Team and released by Ge De Industry Co. around 1995. It is a backport of Dial Q wo Mawase (ダイヤルQをまわせ！), an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive title.

name: Football Rivals
description: Football Rivals is a free multiplayer mobile football game. With daily matches, and various competitions. this game mainly focuses on working together as a team and competing against other teams with real players. In this game the users are the players as it doesn't have neither real life professional teams or professional players.

name: Mind Over Magnet
description: An attractive puzzle platformer where you use magnetism to escape a factory. Meet a cast of magnet characters and work together to solve logical conundrums.

name: Clickpocalypse II
description: Clickpocalypse II is an incremental game disguised as an idle RPG. Create a party to bravely explore terrible dungeons and mercilessly exterminate every monster in the world. Find items, go up levels, learn spells, upgrade abilities, and earn achievements.

name: Pushman
description: A puzzle game about a little astronaut fellow who pushes blocks. Released in 1990 by Sammy Corporation, and developed by Comad Industry.

name: Jump To The Milky Way
description: In the game "Jump To The Milky Way" you will embark on an exciting journey through the vastness of space, jumping from platform to platform and exploring mysterious corners of the galaxy in search of portals to other worlds. Challenge gravity using the unique "space jump" technology and find portals to other worlds. Exciting space landscapes, unexpected obstacles, and incredible secrets await, which you can only uncover with your skills and ingenuity. Become a space traveler and discover new worlds in "Jump To The Milky Way"!

name: Cat Gamer
description:
If you need to relax and your pet is bored, then this application will help you.
Open the world of games for your pet and go about your business or watch your cat get achievements.
In our collection of mini games, your pet will be able to find their favorite game for themselves.

name: A Good Place To Die
description: Kill as many zombies as possible, collect points by hitting them, upgrade your weapons and reach the final boss!

name: Mini Taoism
description: "Mini Taoism" is a realistic Taoism simulation game based on match-3. You'll need to collect resources, use skills, refine elixirs, unlock talents, slay demons, constantly improve yourself, and finally become immortal.

name: Pixel Tank
description: Pixel Tank is a really simple game. It's a pixelated fish tank! Use it to relax or as ambiance in the background of your work day or even while you sleep! Every minute in game you gain a coin. You can use those coins to unlock any fish you want in the game. It's like Pixelated ASMR!

name: The Adventures of LinShanHai: Chapter 4 - Vanishing Masterpiece
description: A famous painting called 'The Rhapsody of the Goddess' worth over 100M has been stolen from the Treasure Chamber on the top floor of the Central Art Museum in City F. The municipal bureau has ordered that the case must be solved within three days due to the involvement of this national treasure.

name: Heroes of Olympus
description: In this Greek God-themed deckbuilder, you'll collect powerful cards featuring legendary gods to create the ultimate deck. With a vast array of cards to discover and powerful gods to harness, the only limit is your imagination. Do you have what it takes to rise up and become a god among gods?

name: Charged: RC Racing - Starter Edition
description: Charged: RC Racing is all about speed and making use of random items. Drive RC Cars in different locations and use items to defeat your opponents.

name: Do.It!
description: A simple Tap game! Infinite Random Levels! How Far can you get? Bounce and Bounce and you will never reach the end!

name: Lewandowski: Football Star
description:
Become a freestyle legend in this beautiful, smooth and addictive soccer game and prove that you can juggle like a pro with the help of Robert Lewandowski.
Show that you're a real soccer champion and master insane tricks and combos! Master your ball control in this beautiful and addictive soccer game and tap your way along with the legend Robert Lewandowski.

name: One Wheel
description:
Take a ride on the great bridge in the sky!
Immerse yourself in the beautiful world above the clouds!
The bridge holds various surprises that will test your unicycle riding skills.
Choose your rider from a multitude of characters, from girls and boys to witches and zombies.

name: Pipe Race
description: Pipe Race is an arcade racing game that simulates driving a rocket inside a pipe. To be the fastest driver and thus win, you have to avoid obstacles that appear in front of you and use bonus features, such as accelerators to increase your speed.

name: Run the Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Vineyard Valley Netflix
description:
Restore a rundown vineyard to its former glory. Complete quests, solve puzzles and unlock past mysteries to design the romantic resort of your dreams.
Nestled in the hills of Vineyard Valley is a rustic resort called the Tangled Vines — it's definitely seen better days. Transform and upgrade the vineyard back into a vibrant, swoon-worthy destination alongside a charming cast of characters in this builder. Get ready for barrels full of mystery, drama and romance along the way!

name: Tap Dragon: Little Knight Luna
description:
An enchanting clicker RPG with dreamy illustrations.
Luna, the little knight, opened her eyes in the Slime Forest upon hearing a mysterious voice.
After a moment of pain, she grabbed her knife and got up again..
She needs to save her friends captured by the Dark Lord As!
Anna, Romi, Enid, Lennon... Free all of your friends!

name: A Bug's Life
description: A Bug's Life is a bootleg Mega Drive port of the game with the same name for the Game Boy Color published by Unite Lucky Technology in 2000. It was also then ported to the SNES in the same year and was published by DVS Electronic Co.

name: Abscam
description: Abscam is one of many Pac-Man bootlegs. Based on FBI's controversial Abscam sting operation, it was developed by GL and published by US Billiards in 1982.

name: Aladdin 2000
description: Aladdin 2000 is a port of Disney's Aladdin for the Sega Mega Drive, made for the SNES presumably by DVS Electronic Co.. The music comes from the official licensed SNES game by Capcom.

name: Aladdin 2
description: Aladdin 2 is an unlicensed game for the Game Boy Advance, developed by Sintax. It uses the same engine as the rest of their GBA platformers. Only 1 copy has been documented online and it currently remains undumped.

name: Drift Long Racing: CyberCity
description: Drift Long Racing CyberCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: JapaneseNightCity
description: Drift Long Racing JapaneseNightCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: SovietCity
description: Drift Long Racing SovietCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: JapaneseCity
description: Drift Long Racing JapaneseCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: JapaneseStreet
description: Drift Long Racing JapaneseStreet,new RaceTrack.

name: Aladdin II
description: Aladdin II is an unlicensed Mega Drive port of the SNES version of Disney's Aladdin, originally made by Capcom in 1993. It might have been developed by ex-workers from Chuanpu Technology and was likely published by X Boy. This port can be considered the "opposite" of Aladdin 2000, a port of Virgin's Aladdin for the SNES.

name: American Crisis
description: American Crisis was developed by the Taiwanese company Computer & Entertainment in 1991 for American Video Entertainment. Very little is known about this game because it was never released. A Famicom prototype has been found few years back. It is a game involving the Iraq War (and Iran).

name: An Hei Po Huai Shen: Diablo
description:
An Hei Po Huai Shen, also known as Diablo or Diablo II, is a backport of Diablo to the NES by Shenzhen Nanjing. The game is a turn based RPG unlike the real Diablo. The game's music has been taken from games such as Golden Sun.

Like almost all of Shenzhen Nanjing's games, dying in a battle will result in you going back to the title screen.

name: Angry Birds
description:
Angry Birds is a port of the famous Android/iOS/Web game Angry Birds for the Sega Genesis. It was originally developed in China by a huge fan of the Angry Birds game and the original ROM is available to download for free. As a result, pirates have put it on cartridge form and sold it to the public. There is also another version on the Famicom (mostly Famiclones).

The game is largely incomplete and contains a bug which makes the game crash after pressing the Reset button.

name: Angry Birds: Star Wars
description: Angry Birds: Star Wars is a bootleg port of the game with the same name for the Sega Genesis. It was developed by BMB and released sometime after 2012, as this was the release year of the mobile game.

name: The Unfallens: Awakening
description: Returning from exile underground, a shattered world awaits you. The once-thriving civilization of Unfallens now lies in ruins. The ruthless guardian wait to attack. Journey through remains, use your skills to overcome intense boss battles. Awaken your true power. Reclaim what was lost.

name: Cross Romance: Koi to Mahjong to Hanafuda to
description: Sin descripción

name: Gekiretsu Pachinkazu
description: Sin descripción

name: Guitar Legend: Get on Stage!
description: Jumpstart your international career as a rock star by playing in front of fired-up audiences in the most prestigious concert halls.. but watch out for the wrong notes!

name: Hyper Securities S
description: Sin descripción

name: Ice Age Dawn Of The Dinosaurs
description: The game based on cartoon of the same name, narrating the adventures of prehistoric wild beasts and mishaps of one purposeful squirrel. Having overcome the tundra and escaping the flood Sid, a sloth, Manny, a mammoth, Diego, a Smilodon, Crash, an opossum, Scrat and other heroes find themselves in the jungle, where a bunch of new problems and misfortunes is waiting for them, including one and very big problem - dinosaurs.

name: Oddnose
description: Nasty and unfriendly clowns have invaded the forest of a funny animal named Oddnose, and now he needs to get rid of them. Cast the balls with your nose and use it and them as weapons. Eat beans with it, thereby causing the gas attack,push off the ground or eat a chili pepper - the effect is impressive. Do your best to get rid of the hated colorful clowns.

name: Re:Curse
description:
Re:Curse is a surreal RPGmaker horror game by Dev Palmer.
Play as distraction-prone researcher Linda Langley and explore as your laboratory distorts and degrades around you. Send emails. Grapple with your clown infestation. Face consequences. Maybe even survive!

name: Cavernas de Marte
description: Sin descripción

name: Comboio Espacial
description: Comboio Espacial is a game for the Sinclair ZX81, where you must protect your convoy by destroying enemy ships and avoiding hitting the space mines.

name: Subespaço
description: Subespaço is a game for the Sinclair ZX81 where you are the commander of the subspace ship Pegasus and your mission is to dismantle the enemies' supply network, depriving them of their vital supplies.

name: Subespaço
description: Subespaço is a bundle that includes three space-related games developed by Ciberne Software

name: Hookscrap
description: Fight as the owner of Hookscrap in a thrilling 2D rogue-like. Unleash the power of your Harpoon, by launching ships & asteroids at enemies. Upgrade your ship with loot from your foes, and become even stronger. Explore 5 unique levels in a randomly generated map & take down the fearsome SC Judgement!

name: Gate Zero
description: Travel through time to ancient Israel in this compelling story-rich adventure. Explore a rich historical world as you engage with familiar events from the 1st century. Gather resources to help the locals, use stealth to avoid danger, and unlock riddles to unravel an age-old secret.

name: Microids Indie Bundle
description: Experience four indie gems with this bundle focused on games by Microids Indie.

name: Pokémon Marron Merda
description:
An Italian rom hack based on Pokémon Ruby filled with obscene humor.

You play an old man who, having turned 10, sets out on his journey with Pokémon. He will meet countless characters, and find himself saving the world by having RAI abolish the program "La Melevisione" , hosted by the now feared Pokémon trainer Tonio Cartonio, who together with his gang wants to take over the world.

name: Plaguemon: Lost Diaries
description:
Plaguemon: Lost Diaries is a horrifying Pokémon Red revision created by modder Hikikomori.

A nuclear catastrophe has happened, and all Pokemon started mutating. People are getting scared and confused. You have been chosen to make things right in this cursed game. Do whatever it takes to get away from this post-apocalyptic nuclear world.

name: Chamberbound
description: Chamberbound is an atmospheric 3D ball roller puzzle game where you maneuver your way through chambers while solving puzzles with a brilliantly engineered ball which functions in unknown ways.

name: Magemania
description: Magemania is a Hidden Object Puzzle where the player has to get out of castle fortresses, solving riddles, finding secrets and avoiding traps.

name: KartMania
description: "KartMania" is a real-oriented racing kart game. Changing settings such as seat position and sprocket diameter, Let's capture the circuit course with driving technique!

name: PixArk: A Sweet Pack for the Sweetest
description: Sweet dreams are made of this! Pixark Candyland is about to take admissions. Get the candy-themed pack, build your own sugary paradise, and share the sweet memory with your friends!

name: Holmes Sherlock & Mycroft
description: Play and get the most clues, ask witnesses for help and manage to solve the case by the end of the week before your opponent with your clues.

name: The Great War 3032
description: We are in the year 3032. For some time now, there has been a war between the Northern and Southern nations. Choose a side and enter the battle as an advanced combat robot. Play against friends in multiplayer deathmatch or team up with up to three others in co-op mode.

name: The Enemy Weapons Are Better
description: Goofy Ahh stories that take place in the world of data. The game simply has to press the move button to run around and kill enemies with their weapons.

name: Plaguemon: Kado
description: Plaguemon: Kado is a ROM hack that serves as a sequel to Plaguemon: Lost Diaries, which is a fan-made hack of the original Pokémon Red game. Plaguemon: Kado is based on Pokémon Trading Card Game.

name: Andrio's World
description: Andrio's World, formerly known as Mobile Andrio, is an Android Mario game, strongly based on Super Mario World, developed and published by Jörg Jahnkel on 2010. At an unknown point, Nintendo sent a copyright claim and the game got taken down from the Play Store.

name: Half-Life: Enriched
description: Half-Life: Enriched aims to update the look and feel of Half-Life with reworked maps and artwork.

name: Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes - Definitive Edition
description:
Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes is a unique mix of puzzle, strategy and RPG: Plan your every move and combine your attacks to defeat your enemies in matching puzzle inspired battle scenarios, upgrade your heroes and creatures to unleash increasingly devastating attacks onto your opponents, and let the strategic thinker in you lead your troops to victory.

Originally developed by Capybara Games, Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes is getting a Definitive Edition including its DLC, refreshed character portraits, many quality-of-life improvements and an expanded, fully reworked and re-balanced online mode!

name: Faith of Danschant: Hereafter
description: Faith of Danschant: Hereafter is an Action RPG inspired by Chinese mythology. Developed by Beijing Joyfun, it is a sequel to the 2017 RPG Faith of Danschant, featuring Chinese martial arts and sword fighting, but now with a realtime action-RPG combat system for even more thrilling and complex battles.

name: Chiller
description:
Chiller is an unofficial game developed by American Game Cartridges for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The game is based upon a notorious arcade shooter by Exidy. It was also released in Australia by Home Entertainment Suppliers.

The game is cited as one of the most violent games ever made for the Nintendo Entertainment System, let alone the 1980s video game medium. Despite being an unlicensed port, the game followed several official examples by being censored with some nudity covered up.

In the game, you are in various medieval settings, usually featuring innocent people restrained in torture devices. The gruesome motive is to kill every NPC in as little time as possible.

name: Codename Jin Yiwei
description: In this Wuxia game, you will play as Jin Yiwei to solve different cases and find the truth hidden under the dark...

name: Caona
description: In Caona, you take part in an Action Adventure Game set in a fictional world based on South American mythology.

name: F1 Manager 2023
description: F1 Manager 2023 gives you unparalleled control of your chosen F1 team, with rich and detailed management features, refined racing spectacle, deeper authenticity and a brand-new mode that allows you to rewrite the season on your terms.Drive every decision and become the best team on the grid across the official 2023 F1 season and beyond.

name: Buccaneers
description:
Buccaneers is a beat 'em up made game for Arcade machines, developed and released by Duintronic in 1989.

You control a sailor beating up pirate thugs in a pirate-themed world, much in vein of The Secret of Monkey Island. You can attack them by either punching or kicking your enemies.

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Ryoma Growth Support
description:
The Ryoma Growth Support Kit contains consumable items that will increase Sakamoto Ryoma's Experience Points, as well as a battle revival item.

It contains:
- Red Daifuku X3
- Yellow Daifuku x3
- Blue Daifuku x3
- Green Daifuku x3
- Training Daifuku x3
- Sacrifice Stone x1

name: Chu Da D
description: Chu Da D (鋤大D) is a Famicom game developed by Ex-Sachen developers and published by Fortune Power/Jichang in 1995. It is based on the card game of the same Chinese name, often known as Big Two elsewhere.

name: Devil Island
description: Devil Island is an action game for the Game Boy Color. It is alternately known as Devil Land, 惡魔城2 月風魔篇 (Castlevania 2: Record of Getsu Fūma), 魔戒博詵 (Lord of the Rings), and 魔戒3-不完美的世界 (Lord of the Rings 3: Imperfect World). The text is completely in Chinese, and no English translation is known to exist.

name: Castle of Dracula
description: Castle of Dracula is a puzzle game, developed and released by Yun Sung in 1994.

name: Frantic Mouse
description: Frantic Mouse is a game for the NES and the Famicom made by Nice Code Software in 2004.

name: Dark Seed
description: Dark Seed (黑暗之蛊) is an unlicensed port of the DOS and Amiga game of the same name, made by Mars Production and published by Yancheng around 2001 or 2002.

name: Box Maker
description:
Box Maker is a clone of Super Mario Maker for PC and Android made by Silver Moon Internet in 2016-2017.

The game at one point was on the App Store and Google Play, but was taken down likely due to copyright reasons. The full game is currently available for purchase on Steam, but cannot be played, also the Chinese version was available for free download and online on mario.web.yymoon.com.

The game servers (International and China) were shut down in 2020, making the game unplayable on all platforms.

name: Digimon Adventure
description:
Digimon Adventure (aka Digimon) is a bootleg platformer for the SNES and Game Boy Advance based on Digimon.

Digimon Adventure uses the same engine as Pocket Monster, thus the gameplay mechanics are the same. The game spans six levels, which include two boss fights. The only playable character is Agumon. The player can attack enemies by pressing A to shoot a fireball. Each level has a strawberry item that, once collected, transforms that the player into Greymon, who's fireball attack is much larger and stronger. Once the player loses all their lives, they're given a chance to continue, which seems to have no limit.

The game steals nearly all of its graphics from numerous other sources. Of all the levels, so far the only identified source is the background from the last battle being taken from Castlevania Dracula X. The sound engine and music are also stolen from Bonkers for the SNES, which, like the game engine, is also used in Pocket Monster and Pokemon Gold and Silver.

name: Digimon 2
description:
Digimon 2 is a bootleg platform game by Makon Soft for the Game Boy Color.

The introduction and main menu song was taken from the original Digimon Adventure Japanese and Latin American anime theme intro. The intro starts with a picture sequence of Agumon evolving into Greymon, transitions into a short FMV sequence of Greymon firing a fire ball, then into a slideshow showing seven of the main human characters, and ends with a few screens of text, before showing the title screen and then the main menu. The intro is well done for a bootleg game, with accurate colors on part with what the system can handle (except for Mimi who has pink skin), a two second smooth FMV, and decently translated English text.

The player starts out playing as Agumon with three extra lives. Agumon can jump, and attack by shooting a fire ball from his mouth. On the first level, Betamon can be found as enemies.

name: Digimon 6
description: Digimon 6, or Digital Monster 6, is a monster raising game originating in Hong Kong. In fact, it is the only unlicensed Game Boy game known to have originated in Hong Kong. Interestingly the game features metal connectors, which allow it to connect to official Bandai Digimon key chains for battles.

name: My Merry May
description: Kyosuke is a high school student who lives a normal student's life in a dormitory until one day he receives a strange device from abroad. Inside the device is a female replis, an artificial human being. Kyosuke decides to awaken her, but before her personality is fully loaded, a thunderstorm briefly cuts the energy in the dormitory, creating a bug in Leu's system. Instead of his own personal servant, Kyosuke now has to take care of a teenager with a childlike mind. The remaining cast of heroines include Hitoe Haruna, Yasusuke's childhood friend, Motomi Agatsuma, the girlfriend of Kyosuke's best friend, Ryo Hagimoto, 21-year old Tae Kizuki, and her friend, 13-year old high school student Misao Yuki.

name: Digimon Crystal Version II
description: Digimon Crystal Version II is a Digimon-based strategy RPG for the Game Boy Color. It was released in 2003.

name: Digimon D-3
description: Digimon D-3 is a platform game for the Game Boy Color released in 2001.

name: Digimon Pocket
description:
Digimon Pocket (called 數碼暴龍口袋版 on the title screen) is a bootleg game developed by Vast Fame for the Game Boy Color.

It is about Digimon trainers who have digital monsters fighting against each other. In the game, a Digimon trainer goes across several towns in the game. A Digimon trainer has a bedroom in his house, when one day a pink aurora portal teleports him to digital monsters world.

name: Donkey Kong 2
description: Donkey Kong 2 (驴子2) is an unlicensed game made for the Game Boy Advance, and was made by Sintax. The game uses the same engine as many other Sintax games, such as Crash Advance IV, Rayman IV, and Lord of the Rings IV. Due to this, this game games shares a good amount of its glitches with these games, mainly having to do with the audio.

name: Super Donkey Kong 3
description: Super Donkey Kong 3 is a Game Boy game based on Donkey Kong Country 3. It was created by Makon Soft at an unknown date.

name: Super Donkey Kong 5
description:
Super Donkey Kong 5 (超级大金刚5) is a port of Super Donkey Kong 3 for the Game Boy Color, and it was also released by Makon Soft.

Because it was released on Game Boy Color, Super Donkey Kong 5 was given a red and green color palette, like other Makon Soft titles for the handheld.

Aside from the color palette, Super Donkey Kong 5 only had a few differences. The title screen and the game's packaging were taken from the Japanese box art of Diddy Kong Racing, even though the two games have no relation. The intro features a different picture, and lastly the world map and level order were changed.

name: Digital Monsters 3
description: Digital Monsters 3 (數碼暴龍水晶版3, also known as Digimon 3 Ultra Dream Version / Crystal Version and Digimon Ruby) is a bootleg game for the Game Boy Color, released in 2001.

name: Lion King 3
description:
Lion King 3 is a platform game released for the Sega Mega Drive based, not the Disney film of the same name, but the original film itself, as a follow-up to The Lion King II. It was developed by an unknown company likely connected to Gamtec and published by X Boy.

A second release does not credit X Boy but it is unknown if it was published by another company or by X Boy without their logo.

name: Golden Idol Mysteries: The Spider of Lanka
description: The Spider of Lanka begins in 1741, one year before the first scenario in The Case of the Golden Idol, and uncovers the awful origins of this five-decade tale of betrayal, greed, ambition and death. Set in the fictional Kingdom of Lanka, this DLC offers three brand new scenarios that will demand the utmost of your deduction powers to unravel.

name: One
description: Boris Osterheld is dead. Venture into a world full of mystery and deceit. As you embark on an apparent search for answers, an erratic murderer and a colorful cast of characters only help to raise more questions. As you gather clues and get closer to the truth you will begin to question reality and even yourself.

name: Rocman X
description: Rocman X (洛克人X) (also known as Thunder Blast Man) is an unlicensed game created by Sachen, released on the Famicom and NES sometime in the 90's and also sometime later for the Game Boy Color. The NES and English Game Boy Color versions were released as Thunder Blast Man, the Chinese version of the GBC game released as 洛克人X金 (Rockman X Gold), and one of the NES versions' label calls it Thunder Blaster Man.

name: Secrets of the Shiratori Twins
description:
It’s double the fun and double the drama when you discover a secret that could ruin the reputation of the most popular girl in school—she’s been swapping places with her equally beautiful identical twin!

Of course, sisterhood isn’t always smooth sailing. Caught in a struggle between two conflicting sides, can you help the twins come to terms with each other and realize their own identities?

name: Gravity Switch
description: Imagine turning space upside down and defying the laws of gravity. Gravity Switch is an addictive game that requires focus, concentration and precise timing. The intuitive one-tap controls allow you to discover the ideal path through all the challenging mazes. Travel as far as you can and use the different power-ups to improve your highscore even more.

name: Halftime Builders
description: Halftime Builders is a game that mixes Tower Defense, Horde Survivor, RTS and Roguelike elements. Pick your defenses, build them up, collect scrap, level up and kill an endless amounts of mobs. Once you die use your hard earned gold to improve your chances and start again!

name: Commander: World War II
description: Commander: World War II is a turn-based tactical game where you lead either the Allies or the Axis to victory. Deploy infantry, tanks, planes, and naval units, capture locations, use the terrain, and counter specialized units in intense battles. Design your own maps and dominate the battlefield.

name: Enid
description: Help Enid stay aflame while exploring the forest and playing minigames with woodland creatures!

name: Cursed Fables: Twisted Tower
description: Can you stop a soul-stealing monster from terrorizing the kingdom?

name: Everlasting Abundance
description: A greedy AAA game company rules the world with an iron fist. You must join a faction of independent rebels and defeat the tyranny of Everlasting Abundance. Can you succeed? Is it all just a pointless dream?

name: Arcade Archives: Galaga '88
description: Win the decisive battle in a massive galactic war!

name: Eukarion Tales 2
description: Embark on a dangerous adventure and do battle against the forces of Kaos. Complete quests to gain experience, learn new spells and abilities, and equip yourself with powerful weapons and armor. Relive this Flash Classic Today!

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova
description: You are the leader of a space-faring civilization at the dawn of the 24th century whose choices for domination are endless: planetary conquest, cultural domination, political alliances, technological supremacy. Your mission is to spread your civilization across the known universe.

name: Top PUA
description: This is an LVG, a GALGAME, a visual novel, a super hilarious game. This story happend in Mainland China. In this game, our protagonist Willie dated a top pick-up artist Lilie. Although she is pretty young, but she know everything about dating with a man.

name: Doppa
description: Guide the lost Doppas to the spirit world by controlling their path in this endless journey.

name: Flora Domina
description: In this unique take on turn-based 4X strategy, play as a nature goddess that defends her island by playing cards to use nature as your ally.

name: Eternal Survivor
description: A fast paced twin stick shooter with roguelite elements. Trapped inside a dungeon room you must endure and survive.

name: Ink Neko Maid
description: A relaxing puzzle game with cat-girls.

name: Digital Exorcist Case_(0);
description: Step into a dark world where cyberdemons haunt humankind. When mutilated bodies start appearing all over this sleepy town in the Mississippi inaka, Sawyer, ex-Agency operative; now unemployed shut-in, must exorcise the demon perpetrator in this story-rich, PC-98 style adventure game.

name: Nox Archaist: Lord of Storms
description: An expansion pack for Nox Archaist, containing the original story plus a new scenario and new features. Puzzles and powerful magic items await, along with dangerous traps and monsters. Those foolhardy enough to brave these perils will come face to face with the Lord of Storms! 15+ hours gameplay.

name: Piano at 5 am
description: "Piano at 5 am." is a short text adventure game. A girl who is the main character wanders in a fog forest while adjusting the four factors of "drowsiness," "thirst," "madness," and "recharge," which increase or decrease depending on the choices she makes.

name: Paper Chaser's
description:
Introducing, Paper Chaser’s!
Come Collaborate with Artists & Content Creators in this new Hip-Hop RPG game as you take your Record Label from the ground to the top! Sign Artists, Perform Shows, Expand your Businesses, & Discover New Ventures as You Explore our Open World. Then, after working hard all day in the studio, signing artist, and sculpting rising talent, enjoy the finer luxuries of life poolside at your mansion! Cruise around town in your Exotic Sports cars! Try your luck at the Casino! Or take a trip to places like the Mediterranean for inspiration and explore hidden gems along the way!
A Brand New 2023 Hip-Hop RPG Game. Take on the role of Jupiter Ki as he goes on the wildest adventures, creating music, making new friends, and over coming crazy obstacles. This is a Venture Hip-Hop RPG Game. Make music, perform show’s, go on quests and invest in money generating properties to become the number 1 Paper Chaser!
This game updates each month with new maps, events, in-game content, music and so much more! Paper Chaser's Album Coming Soon

name: Ninja Chicken 3: The World's Hardest Game
description:
Ninja Chicken is back with a vengeance! Ninja Chicken 1 is a puzzle game, 2 is a shooting game, in 3, you run like hell!

New Ninja Chicken is a action-packed game where you control two brave young Ninja Chickens that want to defeat the Samurai Pig and retrieve their stolen National treasures.

name: Delta-V Racing
description:
Snake your way through the galaxy’s finest race tracks, and charge to victory in some of the coolest ships known to man. Quick thinking and faster reactions are the order of the day. Race tactically; throw off homing missiles with decoy mines or risk the tight fast route to pull a chain-boosted lead then claim your victory from the tournament boss as you take him out with a Laser blast…
Can you take your place at the top podium on every event and become a true Delta-V Legend?

name: Tractor Hero
description: Tractor Hero is a physics-based driving game. Tilt your tractor, collect the fruits & vegetables, and transport them to the specified places within the limited time. You go through the fields, hills, caverns and forests, which makes a realistic effect and more challenges.

name: Tap Gun
description:
Move, aim, shoot!
Different! Creative! Simple! Exciting!
No need to describe this game!
Shoot the bottles thrown to the sky!
Simple Control!

name: Find a Way Soccer: Women's Cup
description:
A football puzzle game, challenging your brain to the max with an all ladies lineup!
Following the games Find a Way Soccer and Find a Way Soccer 2, we are now launching Find a Way Soccer: Women’s Cup - just in time for you to get hyped for the Canada World Cup!
The 24 tricky puzzle levels are all about planning several steps ahead, anticipating your opponent’s next move and keeping track of your teammates. There are several different player types to know and utilize in the best possible way, as well as different kinds of opponents to look out for.
The game features the 24 national teams competing in Canada this summer, following the top-ranked countries. Do you have what it takes to take your team to the winner’s stand?
The ball is rolling… Game on!

name: Rocky
description: Step into the ring with your favorite epic characters from the ROCKY film franchise, including Rocky Balboa, Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang, Ivan Drago, Tommy Gunn, and Mason Dixon! Challenge real players worldwide as you fight your way to the top!

name: Tanks and Turrets 3
description:
Defend your Medieval Village from invading Tanks using Futuristic Weapons!!!
Classic defense style game with 10 different Turrets to defend your lands. 10 Maps with 3 difficulty levels offer many hours of gameplay. Level up your Turrets to advance and compete with Game Center achievements and Leaderboards.

name: Unalive 010
description: Welcome to the captivating world of Unalive - a game where the hero must battle fierce monsters using their shooting skills. You will navigate randomly generated room labyrinths and face challenging bosses, while mysterious events unfold throughout the game. Be prepared for unpredictable challenges and tests at every turn, creating an immersive atmosphere that draws the player deeper into the world's mysteries and enigmas. Will you be able to unravel all the secrets of Unalive? Only time will tell...

name: Engage Souls
description:
Engage Souls is an RPG based on the theme of the new "e Guessing Game".
The story tells of a team comprising five young boys and girls who aim to be professional Engage proponents known as contractors. You Pick from one of six academies and nurture these aspiring contractors and follow their individual stories

name: Xenon Runner
description: Xenon Runner is a fast paced speedrunning parkour FPS where you compete against yourself, your friends, and the world. Utilize grappling, power sliding, recoil knockback, and wallrunning to complete the levels as fast as possible.

name: Paws of Coal
description:
Paws of Coal is a cozy, slow-paced detective adventure with gameplay influenced by the scientific method – quests are solved by connecting evidence. If you get it right, the mystery is solved. If you get it wrong, everyone could be in danger. So, tread carefully.

In the game, you play as Charles, a scholar on a mission sent by His Majesty (the lion king Lav) to help the critters of The Burrows where the outbreak is on the rise. Is it dangerous, or just a mere nuisance? It is up to Charles to find out what is going on.

But there would be problems on his path, both scientific and social.

The Burrows is a mining town, and miners are on a strike
There is no cure for the outbreak, and productivity is suffering. The miners won't tolerate the current scenario and are on strike. The problem? The foreman of The Burrows isn't having any of it and wants to shut down the strike. Unless Charles finds a creative solution.

Paws of Coal is a short, stand-alone game set in the larger Trip the Ark Fantastic universe that is currently in development in Gamechuck. Paws of Coal offers around 3 to 4 hours of gameplay (depending on your play style), and even multiple endings.

The investigation is solved by talking to each resident of The Burrows, finding the clues in the environment, making a lot of notes, and connecting the dots (literally) using the interface in Charles' journal.

When you're sure you got it right - submit the report, and... hope for the best. Good luck!

name: Long Legged Larry
description: Aesop Rock's beloved tale of Long Legged Larry continues in this arcade style platformer. Play as a heroic frog named Larry who uses his extraordinary hopping skills to save a few newfound friends in need. This game offers two difficulty levels to choose from and many challenges to overcome as you valiantly hop your way through multiple levels of danger.

name: Super Ghouls'n Ghosts Restoration
description:
This hack restores the crosses that appeared in the background of stage 1 and on the zombie’s coffin from the Japanese version, and it also changes the names of Asutaroto to Astaroth and Sardius back to being called Samael once again as well.

It also removes most of the slowdowns, making the game much more enjoyable to play as well.

It also makes it where you can access the hidden menu with the first controller by holding L and pressing Start as well.

This hack also works with Lufia’s Super Arthur hack as well.

The 0xED hex editor was used to change the name of the final boss.

name: Mi Hun Che
description: Mi Hun Che (迷魂車), more commonly known as BB Car (屁屁車) or eventually Ecstasy Car and Super Car (奇妙車) is a port of Rally-X and New Rally-X made for the Famicom by Hwang Shinwei in 1988. It was originally published by Chi Chi Toy Co., Ltd under the Mi Hun Che and Super Car title. BB Car is a slight update released 3 years later, in 1991.

name: Sol: Last Light
description: Sol: Last Light is a third-person, action-adventure RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Learn to control your newly discovered power to harness energy from the sun and battle against robots on your journey up the mountain to find your captured sister.

name: Ben 10
description: Ben 10 is an unlicensed Russian Sega Mega Drive port of a beat-em-up for Java phones Ben 10: The Power Of Omnitrix, based on the TV series of the same name. No developer credits exist in the game, but several elements point it to having been made by BMB.

name: Binary Monsters III: School Fighter
description: Binary Monsters III - School Fighter (熱門高校 數碼怪獸III) is a Game Boy Color title published by Gowin, and released in 2001. It is the third game in the Binary Monsters series, and Gowin's 5th GBC-released game.

name: Bio Hazard
description: Bio Hazard (also called 生化危机 or "Resident Evil" in Chinese) is a Famicom pirate made by Waixing in 2003 based on Resident Evil for the PlayStation. The plot follows the original game scripts, although just Jill is a playable character and the game is in Chinese.

name: Block Force
description: Block Force is a port of Quarth originally developed by Konami. It was made by Hwang Jiun-Ming, a relative of Hwang Shinwei and released in 1990. The game was often included in multicarts released by RCM Group between 1990 and 1991.

name: Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Fight 2001
description: Capcom vs SNK: Millennium Fight 2001 is an unlicensed port of Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Fight 2000. Presumably based on the work done on the Game Boy Color port of Street Heroes, there are possibilities that Ei-How Yang was the main programmer of this game as well, despite unproven and incorrect assumptions of Makon Soft being involved.

name: I Read a Post Online about Monarch Butterflies
description:
Made with bitsy for the pollinators bitsy jam,
very, very, very last minute

name: Chinese Tycoon
description: Chinese Tycoon (中國大亨) is a Game Boy Color game developed by Hitek. This is a port of the Richman 2 (大富翁2). It is believed to be the game released under the Hitek name and it appears to be their only board game.

name: Cafe Venus Flytrap
description: You're a fly. A fly whose hobbies consist of writing novels and eating sweets. One day you decide to check out a new cute cafe that promises an abundance of pastries, sweets and drinks. A cafe that is run by adorable froggos.

name: Yuka: Scattered Shards of the Yokai
description:
Thanks to Kappa's careless mistake, Yuuka's common sense and sexual reasoning broke out of her mind into fragments and were scattered all around the world... but by strange coincidence, a mortal from the nearby village just happened to be there and as consequence, he was forced to explain what happened...
The pieces could not be seen with the naked eye and yet the mortal could... so he was forced by Yuuka to help collect the pieces in order to regain the fragments of her mental mind but there was one slight problem...
The fragments were very delicate and easy to break, and if they did then Yuuka's common sense and sexual reasoning will be lost meaning her plump body will be for anyones taking...​

name: Fossil Sweeper
description: Fossil Sweeper is a game about excavating fossils and building skeletons of prehistoric animals.

name: Raimodula
description: Raimodula is a dynamic arcade platformer, featuring customizable characters and randomized progression. Unlock habilities, fight modular enemies and navigate surreal environments with polished controls and intense gameplay!

name: Defense Derby
description: Defense Derby is an epic battle of wits, where you can scout units to defend your castle and reach the top of your Guardian's Journey. Enjoy many different modes, from PvP, Boss Dungeon, Blitz PvE, Friendly Derby and more!

name: Coffee Dates
description: Coffee Dates is a fun and lighthearted visual novel about hanging out with your crazy co-workers and the comedic shenanigans that unfold. There's even a few bits of game play that aren't just reading. Isn't that cool!

name: Neptunia GameMaker R:Evolution
description: Hyperdimension Neptunia GameMaker R:Evolution is set during an era where game makers are competing with each other. There were three goddesses of game makers who were defeated in the race to win "market share" of game sales and perished. Will they be branded as "goddesses of failure" and disappear? However, Adult Neptune who travels many dimensions suddenly appears in their world, asked by the three goddesses to become their president in order to revive the fallen game maker.

name: My Devil Lovers
description: You are the heroine! You take on the role of the heroine and experience romancing with handsome devils!

name: I Spy School Days
description: I Spy is the fourth game in an educational game series based on the series of children's hidden object books.

name: My Devil Lovers: Remake
description: You’re a young photographer with a passion for capturing the perfect image. Just when your goals are out of focus, you come across an old black book...

name: Ducklyte
description: Ducklyte is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements where you play as a constipated little duck trying to stay alive as long as possible in a randomly generated farm with progressively stronger enemies.

name: The Stoevi Curse
description: Unravel the mystery of The Stoevi Curse, a first-person survival horror game set in rural post-Communist Bulgaria. Protect your farm, save your family.

name: Wandering Skies
description: Navigate through the Sky Lands and uncover its secrets to restore their lost harmony. In this first person platformer, use your abilities to reach the end of each level. Observation and skill are the keys to success !

name: Magic Toenail
description: Magic Toenail is a strategic wizarding roguelite where every step you take is a tactical maneuver! You shoot when you move and move when you shoot, so even the simplest enemy encounters will quickly become high-stakes puzzles!

name: Hatsune no Naisho!!
description: Hatsune no Naishou is a collection of Leaf's mini games that any Leaf's fan should not miss. The CD contains several cute mini software including some mini games, screen saver, wallpaper, and CD player. The mini games packed in the CD include a mini action game called Heart By Heart with characters from To Heart, a mini RPG game called Leaf Fighting 97, To Heart Omake, and of course the adventure game Hastune no Naishou.

name: Chef
description: Chef is a fun, easy to play tycoon cooking game with 48 levels to complete. The aim of the game is to prepare and serve the customers their orders.

name: Syd of Valis
description: Wait a minute! When did Valis become so cutesy?!

name: Matches Puzzle: Classic Logic Arcade
description: The classic matchstick puzzle is a real training of logic and brain!

name: Menseki: Area Maze Search
description: Menseki is back, but with a new brain-boggling twist!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Prison Underground
description: Solve riddles and break out from a huge underground facility!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Ninja Otedama R
description:
Slice and dice but don't drop!?
The definitive version of the deranged party game!

name: Galaxy Revo: Remake
description: Destroy enemy spaceships and reach new incredible records with Galaxy Revo: Remake!

name: Ultimate Shot: 3D Real Strike Shouter Counter
description: Are you ready for the ultimate challenge? Take aim and test your skills in The Ultimate Shot – the action-packed game that will put your precision and strategy to the test.

name: Coloring Pixels: Collection 3
description: A relaxing colouring by numbers game. Enjoy completing a variety of images with differing themes, complexity, and sizes.

name: Fortress S
description: The lastest installment in the beloved Fortress series, a fresh take on the artillery shooter genre.

name: Adventure Escape Room Bundle
description: Four escape room adventures for you to puzzle through! Sotano, Vereda, Alumni and Subnet.

name: JanduSoft Games Bundle Vol. 1
description: 4 thrilling games, 1 unbeatable bundle!

name: Harvest Life + Castaway Paradise
description: The Ultimate Bundle for Adventure Seekers: Harvest Life and Castaway Paradise!

name: Love on Leave
description: You have some paid time off and decide to use it to return to your roots in the countryside.

name: Jumping Frog: A Time Traveller
description: The game is a first-person exploratory jumping action game. The game is an exhilarating game in which the player controls a robot that can jump to high altitudes and repeatedly ascends and descends through stages with many elevation differences. Collect the 4 items in the stage to reach the goal.

name: Criminal Archives: Alphabetic Murders - Collector's Edition
description: Are the murders of three different people connected? Or are we dealing with three different incidents? Cunning and logic are your best weapons in solving this case!

name: Monster Memory
description: A stylized card matching memory game based on icons of horror with atmospheric music Relive your childhood with this simple yet fun puzzle game by matching the cards as fast as you can

name: Catch The Fox
description: It's a massive game of tag, who will win?

name: Cryptoforce
description: COF is a first-person shooter that offers players the option to earn cryptocurrencies in feature Players compete for points by going into battle with each other on various maps Gamers can also fight for rewards by facing off against the AI in a battle mode

name: Two Portals: A Gemstone Puzzle Game
description: Open locks, activate gemstones, join passages to the grid and advance to the next level! Two Portals - A Gemstone Puzzle Game is a grid-based movement minimalist puzzle game.

name: DR2 Night Janki
description: DR² Night Janki is a mahjong game with adult scenes. The game has two modes: "Story" and "Regular". The story mode is set in a medieval castle, which is said to be ancient grounds for sorcery, but is currently controlled by the mysterious Rumira, who runs a mahjong club. The hero, a man named Ryuuji, decides to investigate the castle, and therefore has to defeat its inhabitants in mahjong matches.

name: Filsnown: Hikari to Toki
description:
Long time ago, seven gods who were guarding the Earth defeated the evil god Gadim. But time has passed, and the seven benevolent gods have vanished one by one. Evil has awaken from its slumber. It's time for somebody else - a human - to become a hero and to defeat it once and for all. This chosen one is a young girl named Thiria Fray. She must find other girls with supernatural powers to aid her on her quest to defeat the evil.

Filsnown plays like a standard top-down Japanese RPG: the party of heroines roams the world map, descend into dungeons, fight random enemies in first-person perspective combat using regular attacks or magic, and visit towns and villages to buy supplies and to rest. It contains cut-scenes with nudity and explicit sexual situations.

name: Yume Utsutsu Dreamy
description: One day Naoki picks up a mysterious pendant hanging on a telephone pole on the way back from school. On that night two fairies came to his dream saying that an angel could return to the original world if Naoki could make some girls happy during the next ten days. He decides to sleep as much as possible during next ten days and girls start to come to his dreams...

name: My Merry Maybe
description: Sin descripción

name: Looking for Aliens: Collector's Edition
description:
Aliens are among us! Can you find traces of them on Earth, the moon, and the edges of the galaxy? Find all the clues to prove the existence of alien civilizations and discover how making fried eggs can end up in a monster attack!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
• Blast-off with five exciting bonus levels!
• Explore the galaxy with a downloadable soundtrack and wallpapers!
• Tons of hidden cards to collect!

name: Into the Breach: Advanced Edition
description:
Nearly every aspect of the game will be expanded with new content, including:

New Mechs and Weapons: Five new mech squads and nearly forty new weapons.

New Challenges: More enemies, more bosses, and more mission objectives that add additional challenge and variety to any run.

New Pilot Abilities: The expanded roster includes four new pilots and triple the amount of skills any pilot can earn through promotions.We’ll be elaborating on all of this new content over the coming weeks before launch and can’t wait for everyone to check it out.

name: Voltorometer Recharged+
description:
A remake of the game Voltorometer, released in 2009, with improved graphics, sound, controller support and more than 3 times the amount of content.

A simple platformer, run and jump to reach the end of each stage and progress through all the worlds to destroy the factories that trapped you and tried to harvest your electrical energy, unlock new modes and challenges by collecting all the power orbs in each level.

name: Backrooms: Realm of Shadows
description:
Backrooms: Realm of Shadows is a horror game that takes place in a seemingly endless maze of interconnected rooms and hallways, known as the Backrooms. The game is based on the popular internet creepypasta about a mysterious place that exists between the walls and floors of buildings, a place where people can become trapped and lost for days, weeks, or even years.

In the game, you play as a person who has become trapped in the Backrooms, and your goal is to find a way out before the endless maze drives you insane. The Backrooms are a surreal and unsettling place, filled with strange noises, flickering lights, and mysterious creatures that seem to be watching you from the shadows.

As you explore the Backrooms, you'll need to find keys, solve puzzles, and avoid dangerous traps and obstacles. You'll also encounter other lost souls who are trying to escape, but not all of them can be trusted. The deeper you go, the more unsettling the Backrooms become, and the harder it is to tell what's real and what's just a figment of your imagination.

Backrooms: Realm of Shadows is designed to be a tense and atmospheric horror experience, with a focus on exploration, puzzle-solving, and survival. It's a game that will keep you on edge from start to finish, as you try to find your way out of this terrifying and otherworldly place.

name: Erobos Heaven
description:
This is a short, very uncanny horror game, focusing on darkness..
Answering to your prayers, you get teleported into Salvation's land.

But, what answered your prayers?

name: Dig2China
description:
Dig through the center of the Earth in your backyard!
Upgrade your digger and plunge through 13 layers of the Earth to prove that if you dig deep enough, you really will make it to the other side. And make it back in time for dinner!

name: Sketch Doom
description: A mod which turns a classic Doom game into a pencil sketches on paper list.

name: Tetris: Rosy Retrospection
description:
Combines the joyful nostalgia of playing classic Game Boy Tetris with the established comfort of modern gameplay mechanics.

Rosy Retrospection includes a lot of additions and improvements like shadow piece, hard drop, saving scores and more.

name: Lovely Cat: Dream Party
description: All contents are free! Various patterned cats, waiting for you to explore! Different furniture and different interaction methods are waiting for you to unlock! Call your beat friends to come to Lovely cat dream party, collect kittens, and create a wonderful paradise for kittens!

name: Lovely Cat: Mermaid Castle
description: Wow! There are so many beautiful shell eggs! What kind of little mermaid will be summoned this time? There are various types of mermaids for you to choose! Kitten Mermaid, Bunny Mermaid, Bear Mermaid... There are also limited and rare species of Salamander Mermaid and unicorn mermaid! what are you waiting for? Come to Lovely Cat Mermaid Castle and enjoy the joy of playing with the little mermaids!

name: Paper Angel
description:
Paper Angel is a short visual novel made in RPG Maker VX Ace. You have become conscious and find yourself taking care of “Spinwhim”. Why? Who know! It is just great that you are here!

Content Warning: Eyestrain, Clusters, Reality Distortion…

name: Student Council Leader Auriel
description: A simulation-management type eroge game where the protagonist, student council president Adam, kidnaps his classmate Auriel to make her his personal sexual slave.

name: Interloper
description: A space flight and combat simulator.

name: Murder Mystery Paradox: Fifteen Years of Summer
description: Murder Mystery Paradox: Fifteen Years of Summer is a mystery visual novel where you enter the remote and sparsely populated island of Shikinejima and attempt to solve the strangely recurring mystery found there.

name: Aliens: Neoplasma
description:
March 1st, 2169. Medical officer Lieutenant Ashley Smith wakes from hypersleep to find something has gone terribly wrong. Her crewmates and the passengers aboard the spaceship Achilles are dead, the onboard AI is non-compliant, and the ship itself is overrun with deadly xenomorphs. Help Lieutenant Ashley survive and stop the evil plans of the Weyland-Yutani company in this original game based on the Aliens series!

Aliens: Neoplasma is based on the Alien films but has its own story. It has two different endings. Can you get them both?

name: Ookouchi Gengorou Ikka
description: Ookouchi Gengorou Ikka is a cancelled simulation game for the Nintendo 64. The game was not ever officially announced and it's existence is only known through a prototype build that was shown off by Game Tanteidan, a retro game store based in Nihonbashi, Osaka, on their blog.

name: Temple of Darkness
description: Temple of Darkness is a game for the Atari 8-Bit systems.

name: Heiankyo Parameters
description:
The successor to the original Parameters game, Heiankyo Parameters adds a few new features to the game.

Territory
Occupying territory is done by clicking and holding the mouse button over an empty or semi-occupied territory.
