Territories have a number of different levels of occupation, each providing a different quantity of cash once completed. Each territory also provides automatic income at regular intervals once it has been obtained.

Yellow territories are occupied by aliens and must first be cleared before they can be built upon. Each of these combat situations takes into account the player's attack and defense values and with each click, runs a combat simulation. If the player's health reaches 0, attack, defense, and recover are temporarily reduced to 0. The player must wait for these to return before attacking again. Once an enemy has been attacked, their health will regenerate over time.

Cash
Cash is rewarded each time an unoccupied territory is leveled up, and a smaller amount at regular intervals thereafter. Cash can be spent on buying upgrades that affect attack strength and defense level.

Leveling
This is done automatically when the player collects enough XP. Once a level has been achieved, the player receives points that can be spent on attributes. The attributes are assigned at the right of the screen using the + buttons next to the three lines. The five available are Life, Attack, Defense, Recovery, and Cost.

Action Points
Actions can only be performed when the player has enough points to spend on performing them. These can be seen in the purple bar on the right of the screen. Each action takes a number of points to perform, and these points are returned at a rate determined by the recovery score of the player.

name: Town of Salem 2
description:
Town of Salem 2 is the sequel to BlankMediaGames' hit Murder Mystery game, Town of Salem. With a revitalized 3d world, new and reworked roles, improved chat features and much more you can't help but join the Witch Hunt!

Town of Salem 2 pits the Town vs the Coven, Serial Killers, Arsonist, Werewolves, and even the Horsemen of the Apocalypse themselves. Can you survive the Town of Salem again? Use your wits, abilities of deduction, and your role's special abilities to help, or hurt, the Town and lead your side to victory!

name: Super Mario Odyssey: 2D Mario in 3D!
description: Super Mario Odyssey: 2D Mario in 3D! is a mod for Super Mario Odyssey which changes Mario's 3D state into his 2D state while still existing in a 3D plain.

name: Era's Adventures
description: Era's Adventures was a 3D platformer for Android devices. The game follows the character Era and the objective of each level is to find keys and then use them to open the exit door.

name: Spider-Man 3
description: Spider-Man 3 is a bootleg game for the Game Boy Color based on the first Spider-Man movie.

name: Crimson Room
description: An escape-the-room flash game where the player is trapped in a room. This would later be expanded into a bigger series, and eventually ported to the DS under the same name.

name: Octavio Camacho
description:
Based on the online graphic novel. This story takes place in a world filled with science gone mad, old society class revived, and a secret contest to possess
the chalice of Exon. To set the world right Octavio Camacho and his covert task- force named W.A.R.C.O.M are ready to take on the mission.

name: Funny Bird
description: Spread your wings and fly like a bird! Flap your wings by tapping the screen and avoid obstacles that come your way.

name: Not Meow Purroblem
description: Iris is tired of studying and working and just wants to be a cat. Her wish comes true. While she's discovering the joy and downsides of her new form, her girlfriend Maggie is bothered by absence of her partner.

name: The Blue Chamber
description: Sin descripción

name: Seishun Quiz Colorful High School
description:
"Seishun Quiz Colorful High School" is a quiz game released by Namco in March 2003.
As a game, it has a large aspect of a love game, and adopts a system that increases the favorability of characters related to the content when the quiz is answered correctly.
Ultimately, the purpose is to confess to the opponent and become a lover.

name: Concert
description: You become the leader of a rock band of five girls. Will you make a name for yourself?

name: Monster Hunter Now
description: Monster Hunter Now is an AR mobile spin-off of Capcom's Monster Hunter series. Developed by Niantic (responsible for Pokemon GO), it lets the player hunt monsters in the real world.

name: Reflectile
description: Reflectile is a minimal precision-puzzle game that yearns for the early 2000's era of video games. It will test your ability to cut corners, squeeze through tight corridors, and make split-second inputs to reach the goal of each stage. You’ll encounter stages of varying difficulty, all with unique challenges and stylish designs to boot.

name: Persona 3: The Journey
description:
The Journey, also known as Episode Yourself in the Japanese version, is an enhanced version of Persona 3. It includes the entire original game, but with several changes including, but not limited to:

- New Personas in the game have been added.
- The arcana type, stats, and skillsets of some Personas were tweaked.
- Some Treasure chest drops were expanded on.
- Secret videos of the protagonist's dorm mates were added.
- Koromaru can now be taken on walks.
- Several Social Links were slightly modified, such as President Tanaka being available at a different time.
- A Social Link for Aigis was added.
- Monad Depths no longer unlocks automatically upon reaching the top of Tartarus.
- Several new Quests have been added.
- New costumes can be worn in battle.
- A new event involving Chidori Yoshino was added.
- Naganaki Shrine was completely overhauled.
- A hard mode was added.

Save data from Persona 3 can be transferred into the game, which includes the Persona Compendium, Social Stats (Academics, Courage and Charm), and items received from completing Social Links.

name: Final Fantasy X-2: International
description:
An expanded and enhanced version of the original Final Fantasy X-2 with the following changes:

- Introduction of Creature Creator system along with the Major Numerus and Almighty Shinra superbosses.
- Addition of two new dresspheres and four new Garment Grids.
- Altered effects for various accessories.
- White Mage now starts with Cure already learned.
- The Cat Nip accessory now generates constant Berserk and Slow effects on the wearer.
- Trema can now cast spells without needing MP.
- Japanese subtitles altered to match English voice acting.
- Japanese lyrics are displayed in vocal songs.
- The aspect ratio in the opening movie is in 16:9.

This version of the game is only available in a bundle as Final Fantasy X-2: International + Last Mission

name: Starlight
description:
Your name is Iris... A fallen angel. you can't remember anything, what happened? Where did everything go wrong? These questions tear through your shattered class mind like a hurricane, but answers fail to present themselves. It's up to you to find them, and maybe yourself again the process. A festering growing corruption is slowly eating away at you. It all began when you lost your wings... A small crack above your chest... The blistering, bleeding scars on your back... Chains bind you at every turn. Plagued by questions unanswered, guilt, fear, and anger. You can feel reality slipping through your fingers at times... Pulling you into an eternal nightmare that is your own mind. Ghosts, hallucinations, your worst, most feared visages appear before your eyes.

Pick yourself up and face the nightmare.

name: Sex, Drugs, and Beer Can
description: A Coop Based team mod based around the story of Beercan the Jamaican beer can! The mod sees you completing objectives and slaughter all the monsters in sight.

name: Half-Life: Shift-Two
description: You are Otis, a security guard at the Black Mesa facility. After surviving the Resonance Cascade you attempt to escape the facility with your colleagues.

name: Bootleg Squadrog
description:
“Bootleg Squadrog, sir. It is not about individualism. It is not about cowboy heroism. It is about being one cohesive unit. The only identity I have is that of a group identity.”

Bootleg Squadrog is a singler player map pack for Half-Life: Opposing Force, with squad-based and teamwork tactical scenarios.

name: Bleach: Zanpakutou Senshi
description: The mod features a technical hack 'n' slash combat style, where you can fight in a team deathmatch as Ichigo or Grimmjow.

name: Half-Life: Case Closed
description:
You are Bob Dewey, Black Mesa janitor. You arrive at the research facility for another day at work: cleaning up the mess those smart ass scientists leave behind, refilling the soapboxes in the toilets, listening to Barney's stupid jokes and reading Penthouse Magazine. It's not the most exciting job in the world, but it pays good and you get lot's off free donuts. As usual, those scientists create black holes and open gates to other alien worlds filled with creatures who eat human flesh for lunch.

Nothing special, but this time, they really messed it up and those aliens found a way to our planet. And guess what, you are in the middle of all this. While Gorden Freeman kicks alien arse, Corporal Adrian Shephard fights Freeman and Barney Calhoun tries to save some scientists, you just try to save you own butt and get the hell out of Black Mesa.

It's a bigger mess you have to clean up this time...

name: Apico 2.0: I Can’t Beelieve it’s Not Butter(flies)!
description:
The new update is buzzing with an un-bee-lievable amount of new content, including new pollinators, new characters to meet, and more:

New NPCs: New friends from the mainland, Cody and Sto, have come to the APICO Islands to further their research.
Butterflies: Discover, collect and breed a variety of brand-new pollinators.
Solitary Bees: These new pollinators prefer to do things on their own – build new solitary bee hotels and help them along!
New Flowers: Now, there are more ways to keep the pollinator population happy – each new flower has its own new effect on the environment.
Incense: Through the magic of alchemy, make your own incense and candles!
Bee-Sides: New tracks have been added to the chill soundtrack
And More: New books, decorations, and a host of quality-of-life improvements have been added.

name: Half-Life: Crossfire
description:
Return and relive the Black Mesa incident through the eyes of Sgt. Jordan Foster, a security guard battling for survivfal through the Xen invasion in search of Dr. Cross.

Find Dr. Cross, protect her at all cost, and maybe you'll have a chance to get out of this whole mess alive.

name: Lovely Cat: Dessert Bakery
description: Easy to understand, fun and challenging! illustrated collection, come and fill up the illustrated book! Various styles of decoration, come and try it! Call your best friends, come to the Lovely Cat: Dessert Bakery together, make beautiful and delicious desserts, and become a top pastry chef!

name: Land of Legends: Heroes of Loria
description: Land of Legends: Heroes of Loria takes place in the fantasy world of Loria, a Human kingdom besieged by conflict with the Orcs. A group of heroes, which includes you, is being cast down by the All-Seeing-Eye to save humanity once again. Travel alone or with your friends in co-operative mode through the rich and colourful world of Loria and end the Orcs' evil reign.

name: Deep Hunters
description: Deep Hunters is a 2 player multiplayer game that focuses on hacking and deep web. You and your friend signed up for a deep web game, but you didn't expect that the you'll end up fighting with each other for your life. Will you win the game or will you sacrifice your life to save your friend?

name: Outer Colony
description: Outer Colony is an open ended, real time strategy game with a focus on artificial intelligence and simulation-derived mechanics. Set in a sci-fi universe, players command expeditions of spacefaring colonists in an effort to establish settlements on remote worlds. Much of the core gameplay revolves around providing for your expedition’s NPCs, managing its fledgling society, freeform building, and tactical combat. Whatever you do in OC affects the persistent game world, so everything from driving species to extinction to terraforming whole regions is possible.

name: Theatre Wars: Goraku no Dendou
description: Sin descripción

name: Funko Fusion
description: Funko Fusion is a third-person action game that’s all about celebrating fandom. Play with some of your favorite characters from across TV, movies, games, and comics, and explore handcrafted worlds inspired by Jurassic World, Back to the Future, JAWS, The Thing, Chucky, Battlestar Galactica, Hot Fuzz, The Umbrella Academy, Five Nights at Freddy’s, Masters of the Universe, Invincible, and many more!

name: Sotsugyou 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Crystal Colors
description:
Created for Winter VN Jam 2020.

Crystal Colors is a game about two girls trying to live normally in a world that is slowly fading away into pure nothingness.

Will you be brave enough to saved your loved one, or will you be erased too?

name: Motteke Tamago with Ganbare Kamonohasi
description: Sin descripción

name: Crime Mysteries
description: Sin descripción

name: Akihabara Dennou-gumi Pata Pies!
description: Akihabara Dennou-gumi Pata Pies! is a Adventure video game published by Sega, West One released on 1999 for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Yuuka's Mansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Binary Pot
description: Connection with a famous network game "a world", delicious coffee, and network cafe Binary Pot with a famous girl. As a young chief of the shop, a hero will experience various tales with a regular customer etc. Since girls are the players of a network game, respectively, after closing can also meet them on on-line. And the tale which becomes entangled in both of the worlds, the tale which is not involved. Is a hero how to make it put the body on which world?

name: Cartoon Universe
description:
Cartoon Universe was a browser-based game developed by WB Games Montreal featuring Looney Tunes and Scooby-Doo characters. It was described as a free-to-play online world that will provide a safe, social environment for young kids to go on adventures, solve puzzles and play games with their favorite Looney Tunes and Scooby-Doo! characters

The game was free-to-play with micro-transactions and a subscription option. It had an open beta in 2012 and was released for browsers in May 2013 with an iOS version available soon after.

After the game was shutdown its mini-games were re-released in Cartoon Universe: Arcade and Wayforward reworked the story elements into Cartoon Universe: Adventure, though the animated cutscenes were replaced with character cutouts during text sections.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Bend the Roo'les
description: “Bend the Roo'les” features 5 new levels, each with their own unique twist on the formula of Kao the Kangaroo: new perspectives, a retro-inspired design, and the continuation of Kao versus the Eternal World!

name: The Cosmic Wheel Sisterhood
description: Immerse yourself in an enchanting narrative experience as Fortuna, a fortune-teller Witch condemned to exile on her asteroid home. Craft your own Tarot deck, regain your freedom, and shape the fate of the cosmic Witch society.

name: Captive Audience
description: A first person Narrative Thriller set in the confines of the Dark Web TV show "Captive Audience", a sadistic sitcom.

name: I'm Scared of My Girlfriend
description: A short vn about sex and fear.

name: YourToy and Dying: Reborn Horror Game Bundle
description:
Here comes two of our most popular horror titles, includes exculsively content for Xbox players.

Feel a more intense 3D first person experience in this bundle, discover and observe the exquisite items, use them wisely to escape these horrible nightmares.

name: Hasbro Kids Bundle
description:
An Outright Games bundle in support of UNICEF.

Featuring a collection of family fun games, available to purchase for a limited time.

name: Tiny Dragon Story
description: Jump right into an epic adventure set in a 1-bit world. This Tiny Dragon is no pushover and will do anything in his quest to find the Wizard who stole his stuff.

name: Horror Bundle: 3 in 1
description: Horror Bundle 3 in 1: Paratopic + Fatum Betula + Blood Breed

name: Ninjala Story Pack: Chapter Four
description: Bonus content that lets you enjoy the story of Ninjala offline! Complete ninja missions to earn a host of special items!

name: True Disc Golf
description: Realistic disc golf game with easy to learn playability

name: Star Gagnant
description: This new Shmup with its unique rapid fire system will blow you away! !

name: Dessert DIY
description:
Make sweet ice cream, popsicles, and waffles using your creativity in one of the best dessert decorating games!

Experience the satisfaction of preparing your customers' orders with your own hands, meeting their expectations, and witnessing their delightful reactions! Explore a variety of delicious molds, creams, syrups, and sweet ingredients to create mouthwatering works of art!

Does your customer want to take revenge on someone? Prepare yucky desserts with surprise bugs or chili peppers! Such a taste is definitely something no one will ever forget!

Every dessert sold brings you coins, a delightful reward that you can invest in enhancing the appearance of your store. Change the colors of your walls or floor, and add new furniture. Transform your store into a cozy and professional haven, all while having fun!

Ready to get your hands dirty and make unique, colorful desserts?

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Platinum Edition
description: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Platinum Edition is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description:
Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!
Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Sausage Wars: Burning Death
description:
Wait for the right moment, push the sausage homies in the fire and watch them cook well. Just don't get roasted!
With this DLC you will get access to a new Burning stage in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Swords & Bones: Definitive Edition
description: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

name: Sausage Wars: Complete Edition
description: Complete Edition includes the full game and 3 additional stages: Trapdoor Hell, Laser Massacre and Burning Death.

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
description: Become the pizza magnate! Create the best pizza in town!

name: That's a Cow: Special Edition
description: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game.

name: Viridian Room
description: Sin descripción

name: White Chamber
description: Sin descripción

name: Scooby-Doo! & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Arcade
description:
Create and customize your own cartoon character, then step into the AMAZING 3-D Scooby Doo & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Arcade!

Hang out in the arcade with Scooby, Bugs, Daffy and ALL your favorite cartoon friends. Play ten fun mini-games – all included with the purchase of the game – based on the iconic Looney Tunes and Scooby Doo cartoon worlds. Each arcade game comes with multiple levels and increasingly difficult challenges!

Earn coins while you play to unlock other games in the arcade! You can also customize your own 3-D cartoon character with special clothes, hats, and styles!

Scooby Doo & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Arcade contains hours of fun for kids AND adults! With multiple user profiles, share the game with the entire family – and no one will lose their progress OR their score! Everyone in the family will enjoy creating a cartoon character in their own unique style!

Challenge yourself to unlock tons of achievements as you play through multiple levels on each of the TEN included arcade games!

name: Insert Rich Family Name
description: As one of the surviving members of a wealthy family, navigate a treacherous web of lies, deceit, and suspicion to identify the killer and claim your inheritance. But with a killer on the loose, you must be careful not to become the next victim.

name: Hazard Hill Idle
description: Hazard Hill Idle is a small city builder, Buy, Sell and Expand to maintain your population from natural disasters that can strike at any time.

name: The Pellar
description: The Pellar is an action-adventure game in which you play the role of a lonely quack doctor. Your task is to prepare medicines, potions and bandages that will be used to help those in need. Struggle with healing various ailments in this magical world inspired by Slavic mythology.

name: BananaGuy
description: BananGuy returns for a new epic adventure! Collect "Power Coins" and explore goofy worlds in the ultimate search for the legendary golden banana!

name: Illum
description: Embark on a heartwarming journey with your little light friend to solve puzzles and bring light to the mystical realm of Illum.

name: Biscuitts 5
description: Biscuitts 5 is a First Person Shooter game.

name: Sex Simulator: The Beach House
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring HD graphics and videos, with realistic looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a hot man who has sex with three lucky women inside his luxurious beach house.

name: Nomad Station
description: Become a master MI6 saboteur, and earn your name as the ministry's most important asset on the Moon in this 1st-person shooter VR sci-fi epic! Follow the orders of your handler, or explore and find new weapons and defenses! Do whatever it takes to complete your mission!

name: Death In Abyss
description: Death In Abyss is an intense flight shooter that challenges you to utilize your maneuverability and explosive firepower to survive against the deep sea hostilities.

name: The Last Z VR
description: A cooperative virtual reality game playable from 1 to 12 players with a variable game duration between 10 to 30 minutes.

1984 is a first-person survival adventure set in Orwell's timeless dystopia. As Winston Smith you must carefully plot your secret rebellion against Big Brother, while avoiding the suspicions of the Thought Police. Adaptation by the Narrative Designer of Subnautica, Talos Principle and FTL.

name: Not the North Pole
description: "Not the North Pole" is a magical VR game where players become Santa in a wintery world, battling festive foes. Enjoy strategic round-based gameplay fighting off snowmen, nutcrackers, and more. Customize your Mecha Santa robot and embark on enchanting adventures for all ages!

name: Sorcerer's Mid-month Exam
description: Step into an exhilarating fantasy world adventure where you'll confront a series of spine-chilling monsters. In this astonishing VR game, you'll need to maintain unwavering focus, utilizing your unique and powerful skills to defeat these formidable adversaries one by one!

name: Poetry of Blood: Eclipse
description: Poetry of Blood: Eclipse is a 2D rogue-lite platformer action game. Heroine "Yue", codenamed Ishtar, fight against various enemies using different weapons, equipment and mechs. Explore the futuristic world and uncover the astonishing secrets hidden behind!

name: Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories
description: 'Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories' is a humorous co-operative escape room game where you are a henchman who has to make his way through variety of puzzles to make it to a job interview on time. Can you solve all of the puzzles that stand in the way of your employment?

name: Testament
description: RPG about ancient warriors in the sci-fi future with graphics in the style of old console games. Fight monsters from ancient myths in hard tactical battles. Read the dramatic stories in the text events. Upgrade the equipment of the past and the future. Train heroes.

name: Millennial Simulator
description: Its called Millennial Simulator. Pretty self explanatory. Work, earn cash, pay rent, upgrade, eat, sleep, explore. Repeat and suffer.

name: Sven: Completely Screwed
description: Play the passionate, immoral ram Sven and try to bring every sheep from the flock to their climax - but don’t get caught by shepherd Lars and his trusty dog Wotan in the process! Spunkier and hotter than ever before!

name: Beach Gas Gas
description: Beach Gas Gas is a high-speed driving game that is all about adrenaline and excitement.

name: Silica
description: Silica is a crossover of FPS and RTS where up to 3 factions battle for control over the planet of Baltarus. Lead from above as commander, or experience the action first-hand, either alone, or with friends. Join one of two human armies, or hunt them down as the territorial aliens.

name: Thereafter
description: You play as a stray black cat, abandoned in a dark alleyway. Your goal is to find and untangle the mysteries of several lost spirits in order to fulfill their journey into the afterlife.

name: Frozen Shelter
description: Frozen Shelter is an indie first-person walking simulator game made in realistic 3D graphics. As a location, the player will be presented with a bunker built during the Cold War of the USSR. The fascinating atmosphere of loneliness will put pressure on the player throughout the game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Motorcycles
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Birds
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: EcoMahjong
description: The classic Mahjong game with a thrilling story!

name: Chef
description:
Chef is a fun, easy to play tycoon cooking game with 48 levels to complete.

The aim of the game is to prepare and serve the customers their orders. You will need to be quick , efficient and most importantly accurate, wrongly created orders go into the bin, losing you money and serving a customer too slow will lose you much needed income.

In low levels, this may not be a deal breaker, but pretty soon it will get very challenging as you advance your career and move to higher levels.

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Edition Contents:
- The game
- Digital Art Book
- Digital Soundtrack

name: Ragnarock: Vikings On Tour
description: Lead your viking ship to victory in this rhythm game! Pound your drums to the sound of epic music, from celtic rock to viking power metal, and set sail against your rivals in multiplayer mode. Will you outrace them all and carve your name on top of the leaderboard?

name: Suds
description: Join the Suds and protect their village from invading evil slimes. Compete to defeat the most enemies and climb the world leaderboard. With engaging gameplay, stunning graphics, and cute characters, Suds is an adventure you won't want to miss!

name: The Old Man and His Cat
description: Play as Domino, a stray cat in love with food, in this heartwarming adventure where you help an old man overcome his grief after his wife passed away. Use your feline skills to explore and solve puzzles as you strive to bring joy into the old man's life and build an unbreakable bond with him.

name: Unsupervised
description: You and your friends were the sidekicks of the world’s greatest heroes. But now that they are gone, will you pick up their mantle or tarnish their legacy?

name: Meduziak
description: A silly underwater point-and-click adventure puzzle game.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 02
description: Season 2 Episode 2: Food Feuds! Failing to transform Cody and Peter into Losers on her own, Kitty enlists Juvie's help in pranking the two.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel's Women of Power
description: Team up with the stellar female Super Heroes of the Marvel Universe in the Marvel's Women of Power two-pack, which combines two tables featuring Ms. Marvel, Spider-Gwen, Squirrel Girl, Black Widow, Captain Marvel and more as they combat villainy!

name: Jump, challenge 100 floors
description: This Is a simple, casual, relax and fluency action game. You can jump and challenge 100 floors to arrive the top. Each floor's postion generates randomly. You can collect the coin on each floor. The length of floors will change to add difficulty.

name: Graveyard: The Shift
description: Always wanted to work in a graveyard? Maybe, maybe not. But now you have a chance to experience it! Graveyard Shift is a horror thriller based in a graveyard where you work the literal graveyard shift, but nothing is what it seems. Explore this supernatural world and uncover its secrets!

name: Hazy Mind
description: You can't remember anything, and all you can see is HER. Delve into your story and uncover the truth behind what happened to you and your parents.

name: Alchemist's Fantasy R: A Girl's Alchemic Furnace
description: The young alchemist Meti from the village, along with her boyfriend Nero, begins a quest to find their missing master. Meti's ability to synthesize magical creatures helps the couple overcome various challenges they encounter on the way, and they discover a secret that changes their lives.

name: Tinker Tanks
description: "Tinker Tanks" is an action-packed 1v1 multiplayer tank game on Steam that offers fast-paced, strategic gameplay with power-ups to supercharge your tank. Experience thrilling, high-octane tank warfare in 2-3 minute skirmishes and defeat your opponents with quick reflexes and strategic gameplay.

name: Pinball FX: Indiana Jones - The Pinball Adventure
description: Relive iconic scenes from the movies in Indiana Jones: The Pinball Adventure, the 1993 Williams classic. Escape Castle Brunwald, feed your pinballs to the mysterious Idol, and brave the Path of Adventure.

name: Daemonium
description: Daemonium is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror. Demonic possessions are running rampant. Grab your equipment and your team and get to work locating and removing the source of the demonic presence. Enter the portal to the demons home and stop the possession once and for all.

name: The Scrap
description: The Scrap is an independent third-person shooter that takes place in a futuristic world inhabited by robots.

name: Alpaca Sprint
description: Run, dodge trees, and see how far you can get in this retro arcade inspired runner!

name: Gates of Yore
description: A dungeon building game which gives you the freedom to create stories and adventures to share.

name: San Fernando
description: Your assignment: a distant island town named San Fernando. As an anthropologist, you’re tasked to gather notes about the town’s culture, and to find out if there is more to this community than meets the eye. How much of this town’s secrets will you discover?

name: Active and Operational
description: Active and Operational is a Scifi Horror game set in an abandoned space ship. After activating the dormant A.I. there, escaping it has become your top priority. Fix the ship corrupt systems, adapt to extreme life-or-death situations, hide from them.. shh.. hide. Get back to your ship. Are you there?

name: Pinball FX: CastleStorm
description: Wanna battle your way through menacing hordes of Vikings? You can do that and more in CastleStorm Pinball, an epic medieval adventure in pinball form. Barge into a world of dragons, swords and... sheep!

name: Rocket Jump Frenzy
description: Rocket Jump Frenzy is a punishing game where you need to climb a mountain using a rocket launcher.

name: Grape Juice City
description: A friendly but competitive couch party game for all ages! Play as tropical birds competing to splash pedestrians with your team’s juice in this match-based party game. Bounce around a tropical metropolis, gather fruit and recyclables, craft juicy drinks, and splash the people of Grape Juice City!

name: Fate Chessboard
description: Fate Chessboard is a Roguelike card game that combines an original turn-based combat system and mine-sweeping elements. In the game, you need to continuously use wisdom and strategy to build your own cards, fight against various powerful enemies. Get ready to embark on your adventure journey!

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 4
description: This stunning collection of three authentic Williams tables includes White Water, Red and Ted's Road Show, and Hurricane. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 2
description: This stunning collection of three authentic Bally tables includes Black Rose, Attack from Mars, and The Party Zone. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 5
description: A stunning collection of three authentic Williams and Bally tables! Tales of the Arabian Night, Cirqus Voltaire, and No Good Gofers are all available both in classic form and remastered with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Heroes Within
description: Celebrate your favorite characters with Star Wars Pinball: Heroes Within featuring four brand new pinball tables including Star Wars Pinball: Han Solo, Star Wars Pinball: Droids, Star Wars Pinball: Episode IV A New Hope, and a table dedicated to the Masters of the Force.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Balance of the Force
description: Feel the disturbance in the Force in Star Wars Pinball: Balance of the Force, featuring three brand new Star Wars pinball tables. The pack includes Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, Starfighter Assault, and a table dedicated to Darth Vader.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 3
description: This stunning collection of three authentic Bally tables includes Theatre of Magic, Safe Cracker, and The Champion Pub. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Brothers in Arms - Win the War Pinball
description: Stick close to your brothers as you liberate towns in the Netherlands during WW2 – armed with a silver ball and your skills.

name: Pinball FX: Core Collection
description: Core Collection, a package of four beautifully crafted pinball tables featuring Secrets of the Deep, Biolab, Rome and Pasha.

name: Pinball FX: Homeworld - Journey to Hiigara Pinball
description: Inspired by the classic, critically-acclaimed strategy series. Strategize, build up your fleet, and clash in colossal space battles to earn jackpots and the high score!

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Unsung Heroes
description: Journey to a galaxy far, far away and fight alongside unhailed warriors as they take on the might of the evil Empire in the Star Wars Pinball: Unsung Heroes pack!

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Avengers Chronicles
description: Marvel's The Avengers (based on the 2012 film from Marvel Studios), Fear Itself, The Infinity Gauntlet and World War Hulk. Avengers Assemble!

name: Pinball FX: Carnivals & Legends
description: Zen Studios presents the Carnivals and Legends two-table pack featuring original designs, "Adventure Land" and "Son of Zeus."

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Vengeance and Virtue
description: Marvel Pinball returns with Vengeance and Virtue, a package of four brand new beautifully crafted pinball tables featuring Ghost Rider, Moon Knight, Thor and X-Men.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball
description: Feel the power of the Force in Star Wars Pinball! Interact with the most iconic characters, and relive the greatest moments of the Star Wars universe in: Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, Star Wars: The Clone Wars, and Boba Fett.

name: Pinball FX: Grimm Tales
description: Surviving your own fairy tale, brave knight, requires first reliving seven of the Brothers Grimm's most classic stories. Find the seven dwarfs, awaken Sleeping Beauty, protect Little Red Riding Hood, escort Cinderella, and more. My, what big jackpots you have!

name: Pinball FX: Borderlands - Vault Hunter Pinball
description: Welcome, Vault Hunter, to a pinball game of looting and jackpot shooting! Face down fearsome psychos, skags, and bosses as you fight your way across Pandora!

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 1
description: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Volume 1 is a dazzling collection of three authentic Williams tables. The Getaway: High Speed II, Junk Yard and Medieval Madness are available in a classic and a re-mastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: My Little Pony Pinball
description: Visit Twilight Sparkle and her friends as they begin preparations for the largest party Equestria has ever seen! Play everypony's mane mode to start the Wizard Mode, and lock balls into the Tree of Harmony for a spectacular 6-ball multiball!

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - The Last Jedi
description: It's time to play Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi! Revisit Luke Skywalker and Rey on Ahch-To Island, and help the Resistance survive the First Order. Relive movie scenes as unique pinball action on these two beautifully crafted pinball tables!

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 6
description: Three classic tables! Funhouse (starring Rudy, the iconic dummy antagonist), Space Station, and Dr. Dude and His Excellent Ray.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Heavy Hitters
description: Do you have what it takes to handle your favorite Marvel Super Heroes? Prepare for exciting pinball action built around Marvel's most explosive personalities in the Marvel Pinball: Heavy Hitters Pack!

name: Tower Tactics: Celestial Dawn
description: First expansion for Tower Tactics! Comes with 40+ new cards, 40+ new trinkets, 4 new decks, 4 new enemies and 40 new maps!

name: Aerion: The Last Alchemist
description: Aerion is a cozy casual fantasy adventure game where you explore flying islands, create potions, and help magical creatures save their environment. Each island is filled with unique creatures and biomes. Without your help, these will vanish.

name: Glypha: Vintage
description: A fast-paced, Egyptian-themed jousting tournament recalls 1980's classic arcade action.

name: Notes of my silence
description: Plunge into the silence with Stephan, young musician that lost his hearing and, at the same time, the meaning of life.

name: Battle of Zodiacs
description: Fully competitive game, where the goal is to dominate your enemy's land! To fulfill their objective, each player will assemble a team of heroes and a deck composed of items and spells. Get ready to enter an epic battle that unites the zodiac signs with the medieval fantasy world!

name: Story of Infinity: Xia
description: "Story of Infinity: Xia" is A martial arts style Roguelike adventure A·RPG standalone game. The background of the story is set for the martial arts, the internal force martial repair system was born soon. Allow you to explore the uplifting changes in the world of Reiki in a pleasant blow.

name: K.I.A
description: K.I.A is a leading agency in stealth operations, seeking those with exceptional skills in infiltration, espionage, and reconnaissance. Join their elite team to execute high-stakes missions that require precision and cunning. Test your limits and make a real impact in the world.

name: Aces & Adventures: Luck of the Paw
description: Cute cat themed playing card deck cosmetic

name: My Monstrous Roommate. (étude)
description: There is a monster living in your apartment.

name: Monster Lover: Balasque
description: "Summon a Vengeance Demon," they said. "What could go wrong?" they said. Our main character is in over his head! Fortunately, the demon Balasque has taken a liking to him. Wait...is that actually fortunate? A NSFW Visual Novel Dating Sim with a Truly Monstrous Monster!

name: BoostHead
description: BoostHead is a party brawler for up to four players. Battle it out in arenas using special moves and power-ups. BoostHead is perfect for players of all skill levels and is the ultimate party game for those seeking a fun and exciting experience with friends.

name: ReLinked
description: "ReLinked" is a pixelated Sovietpunk action/PRG in which you have to fight back against extraterrestrial intelligence and uncover the mysterious secrets of faraway space.

name: Elevator Project
description: We are developing a puzzle solving game with an elevator motif. This game is currently in the early stages of development.

name: Ayase, the Sexy Archer
description: Ayase is an archer and hunter of the king's court with the task of traveling far and wide to eliminate the monsters that have ravaged her homeland. This time, Ayase confronts a nest of monster in an abandoned village near the old palace of the king. Follow Ayase and see how far you can go.

name: Demonheart: The Cursed Trial
description: You are a girl with a demonic heart, trapped with a group of suspicious individuals. When a demonspawn arrives, the humans start dying. Save your life and romance some shady characters!

name: Radiated Life
description: You are satan, trying to make the only survivors of the apocalypse leave God's side. Give instructions to your people, and make them build a habitable base. God is trying to make you fail, by attacking your humans with dangers that won't kill them, but make surviving harder.

name: Don Salmon
description: Discover the secrets of the Great Waterfall as you fight your way back home in this A 2D pixel-art combat platforming adventure.

name: Trials of the Spirit
description: Restore balance to the world in Trials of the Spirit! A Roguelike adventure through not only the human empire, but the spiritual realms. Use the elements of Fire, Water, Rock, or Wind to purify corruption and restore order to the world.

name: Shadow of the Treasure
description: A fantasy pseudo-card game of 15 levels that tests your thinking and combinatorial skills.

name: Death Harvest
description: Death Harvest is a cooperative VR indie game in which players assume the role of a group of survivors from the Boston combat unit - the Reapers. Fight for the survival of your colony in a post-apocalyptic world full of zombies.

name: Haunted Tower
description: A game about Strategy, not Gems. Tower Defense game focused on strategy with well-balanced levels and a variety of game modes.

name: Imprisoned Hyperion 2
description: Imprisoned Hyperion 2 is an imersive sim, first-person rpg. Explore the dark and dangerous dungeon. Survive by finding safe resting places and cooking food. Help different creatures and learn the dark history of this world.

name: Last Day of Zombies
description: The indie-casual game of Last Day of Zombies comes to confirm this principle once again.

name: Astro-Not
description: Join the community of Astro-Nots and explore the galaxy, compete for the fastest time or share your creations with other players. Take on the challenge and become the ultimate Astro-not!

name: Dreieck
description: Play as a lowly triangle in this fast-paced top-down shooter on a dystopian polygon-based universe. Defeat your oppressors, claim glory!

name: Fursona Festival
description: Wander into the carnival of a giant magical dragon lady, where nobody ever leaves unchanged! Answer an extensive list of questions disguised as mini games as you explore the carnival grounds to discover what animal spirit lives inside you.

name: Shoot Fighters
description: Step into the future where the universe's fate hangs on judicial duels fought by elite pilots in unique spaceships. Represent your galaxy and defend your values in unpredictable judicial duels. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping ride into the future!

name: Space Sergeant Survivors
description: In Space Sergeant Survivors, player takes on the role of a lone protagonist facing a unrelenting horde of enemies

name: Bom Bom Bombian
description: Easy-to-use bomb action! Throw bombs and mine Bomcoin! Aim! Bomberhead Champion!

name: The Last Survivors
description: Kill the zombies and take on challenges by helping the last survivors in the city. The Last Survivors is a fun roguelite action game with an infinite power-up experience that is repeatable every time you play. Never stop, collect as much XP and Boosters to get stronger by choosing your upgrades.

name: Bridgebourn
description: Explore a handcrafted semi-open world filled with secrets and treasure with your band of adventurers in this immersive, story rich ARPG. Combine abilities for powerful reactions to fight what lurks in the depths of dungeons. Enhance your playstyle with magic loot. Uncover mysteries of the Fadelands.

name: Knight, Death and the Devil
description: Knight, Death and the Devil — This is a dark visual novel that will take you into a creepy world full of danger and unexpected twists.

name: Colors of Nobility
description: Every enemy drops unique curios. Every NPC unlocks permanent changes to the story. Every biome has unique interactions and consumables. There is no right way to play the game, just a carefully crafted world for Fork to explore and discover in this hand-drawn rogue-like deckbuilder.

name: Plungeroo
description: Plungeroo is a colorful puzzle game about tinkering with mini pinball cabinets, no quick reflexes or quarters required! Maneuver your ball through Pop Bumpers, Flippers, and more until you become a pinball wizard!

name: Stop the Crawl
description: Stop the Crawl is half dungeon crawler, half tower defense. You play as a slime reclaiming a dungeon, finding loot and capturing monsters along the way. But beware, heroes are coming to raid your dungeon. Use your monsters to stop them from reaching your dungeon’s heart. Can you Stop the Crawl?

name: As One We Survive
description: As One We Survive is a top down survival game set in a post-apocalyptic America. Step into the shoes of a father as he tries to find help for his sick daughter during a grid down post-pandemic event. Fight, scavenge, craft, and gather resources for your family's survival.

name: Costly Adventure
description: Costly Adventure is a Match-3 game with RPG elements. Exciting talent trees and itemization will quickly change the way you play. Will your party withstand the ever increasing tolls of the bridge troll?

name: Battle Plan: Jester's Knife
description: Battle Plan: Jester's Knife is a sliding tile strategy game with hand-drawn animation and combat. Choose from fantasy characters, plan tile sequences, and defeat opponents in turn-based, real-time or one tile move modes. Compete online or locally in PVP with a time limit. Be the ultimate strategist.

name: Grim Tales: Dual Disposition - Collector's Edition
description: When a souvenir shop dealing in oddities is ransacked, you’re shocked when you’re the prime suspect! Your double has come from another reality to disrupt the flow of magic, taking your abilities in the process. Can you save the sources of magic and clear your name in time?

name: Midline '85
description: Midline ‘85 is an interactive psychological thriller about working as an emergency call-taker in the murky past of 1985. Protect your hometown of Midline from death and destruction, and protect your protagonist from succumbing to the stress of her job…

name: Machine Love 2069
description: Machine Love 2069 is a visual novel for adults with clicker elements and mini-gamesAlex has always been a skilled hacker. One day he received an unusual job offer from a girl named Maya. Maya was a hacker herself, but she needed Alex's help to handle a big task.

name: Chronicles Of Errodean
description: Embark on an epic adventure to collect three powerful relics in this medieval RPG. Explore ancient ruins, fight mythical beasts, and master magic to save the kingdom from an evil sorcerer.

name: Weak Soul
description: Get up. There is no place in this world for those who are weak. I must free the continent from the demons before they get rid of me. Any choice can change someone's fate. But I will fight as long as the flame of my soul burns.

name: The Girl From the Snuff Video
description: A visual novel about a girl who watches a snuff video to relieve stress, justifying herself with the fact that what is happening on the screen isn’t real...

name: Crash Cars: Driven to Destruction
description: Dive into a car crushing simulator that feeds your hunger for speed. Customize your ramp height, slam down the accelerator, and send your car careening into a stunning landscape of time-worn clunkers. Experience the adrenaline rush and embrace the thrill of vehicular destruction.

name: Bokura no Keshigomu Otoshi Shingakki 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Cattle Hyperdrive
description: Cattle Hyperdrive is a space trucking open world game that takes place across the solar system.

name: Treasure Star
description: Treasure Star is an adventure game inspired by the first Legend of Zelda for the NES and the movies of Indiana Jones to create a game with an emphasis on exploration. Go back to the '80s, travel in time, and make your way to a treasure lost in time.

name: Aldro
description: You play as Aldro, a cute slime lost in an unexplored world full of magic and mystery. Explore procedurally generated levels full of strange creatures and resources unique to the area. Cultivate anywhere you choose and gather resources to build and defend your civilization from the dangers outside.

name: Love Love Diary
description: Complete the puzzle challenges to win the hearts of 15 different girls with various professions. Apply the patch and dive deeper into their lives!

name: Crab Raid Tactics
description: Crab Raid Tactics is an Action Strategy Roguelike game where you command a squad of crabs to overcome swarms of monsters and challenging bosses by collecting upgrades, triggering powerful elemental reactions and avoiding threats of a constantly changing environment.

name: The Magistrate
description: The Magistrate is a construction & management sim game which at the same time provides players with unique legal case investigation experiences.

name: Postfrost
description: Welcome to the frozen wasteland of our post-apocalyptic world! In this multiplayer game, you and your friends will have to work together to brave the harsh winter conditions and fight off dangerous enemies to survive.

name: Shrommzzz
description: Fung around and find out! A cozy mushroom foraging and farming game. Plant shromspores on 6 different islands to unlock all combinations. Can you make all 100 of 'em pop up? Challenge accepted!

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Ultimate Edition
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Run Sausage Run: Coins, Bugs and Chicken
description:
Three new sausages: Fly, Cockroach and Plucked Chicken
and 15,000 coins to unlock your favorites sausages with powerups.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Hardened Marine Pack
description:
The Hardened Marine Pack includes the following cosmetic items for your Aliens: Fireteam Elite marine:
Bandana Head Accessory
Digital Red Camo Weapon Color
Adios Weapon Decal
Endeavor Weapon Decal
Flames Weapon Decal
"Chestburster" Joke Emote

name: Star Wars: Heritage Pack
description: Seven Classic Star Wars Games.

name: Unboxing the Cryptic Killer
description: Unravel the mystery of a cryptic box in this 2-player co-op puzzle game. Join forces as two detectives, solve cooperative puzzles, communicate effectively, crack the codes and outsmart the killer.

name: Little Postman
description: Puzzle game where you rotate islands to find your way around different archipelagos.

name: Lords and Tactics
description: Here, you will start from scratch and meet like-minded comrades. With wisdom and courage, you set out on a journey to conquer and unite the lands. Use the Strategy system and deploy Frontline, Center, and Rearguard units to fight your opponents in small-scale skirmishes.

name: Unnatural: Season Two
description: Raise a new organization from the ashes of the SRT and guide Silver Cross Incorporated to protect the innocent from the darker side of humanity.

name: Mirage
description: Jump through mystical desert ruins and shoot the bird-like guards to steal their treasure.

name: Button VR Expeditions
description: Button VR Expeditions is an immersive and challenging virtual reality game that takes players on a thrilling adventure through a series of dangerous and exotic environments.

name: FatSheep Crisis
description: Fat Sheep Town has monsters! Use skills to defeat them. Plugins help warriors survive. Many maps have risks and rewards. Pick an occupation and weapons. Level up weapons. Combine skills, plugins and weapons. Defeat the villain!

name: Penguin Noir
description: One fateful night, while Penguin P.I. Giuseppe Squawks is out to dinner with his dearest girlfriend, a seemingly random explosion takes his loved one from him. Now, aided by an octopus named Tony the Tickler, he must hunt down the Mafioso who orchestrated the accident and bring him to justice.

name: Winter Stealth
description: Winter Stealth - You have to play as a hired agent who is able to get where the rest can not. Take orders and go on an adventure! Dodge enemies, complete missions and find secret items. Risk everything and go with the hero on a wonderful journey!

name: Camelot 2: The Holy Grail
description: A terrible disease has struck Queen Guinevere! The only thing that can save her is the Holy Grail. But the ancient artefact has long been lost somewhere in the expanses of Avalon. Can you manage to overcome all obstacles, find the Grail, and save the queen?

name: Panic Lane
description: Are you ready for the most intense driving game you’ve ever played? In Panic Lane, your goal is simple: survive. You'll be on the edge of your seat as you dodge randomly spawned obstacles and fight relentlessly just to stay alive. Will you make it? There’s only one way to find out.

name: The Flying Feathers
description: Nia accidentally goes into her best friend—Alice's past, the only way to escape and go back to the real world is to help Alice to solve all her problems. When you can go back to the past, do you want to do everything you can to save what you've lost?

name: The Murder Hotel
description: Interrogate suspects, search for clues, & uncover a dastardly plot, as you solve a string of mystifying murders to help reluctant detective Ilmarinen escape the foreboding Fafnir Hotel. From the maker of The Donnerwald Experiment comes a detective adventure with a twist.

name: Forced Sacrifice: Hejled
description: This game provides a fun and challenging experience for gamers who enjoy fast, skill-based arcade-style games with immersive audiovisuals and a focus on high scores.

name: Hibernation Day
description: Hibernation Day is a short dialog based adventure with cozy visuals. It's about family and the problems we face trying to keep it afloat.

name: Ghostcon: Elementals
description: Ghostcon: Elementals is a Sci-fi Action-RPG with choice based dialogue, third person elemental powers, and first person shooting. Will you choose to stay a soldier, rise as a hero, or emerge as a villain?

name: Is It Wrong To Try To Rescue Monster Girls From The Inquisition?
description: Solve otherworldly puzzles, rescue quirky monster girls and uncover the secrets of the kingdom together in this light-hearted isekai visual novel.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws Pack: Korea
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Kemono Friends: Opening Day
description: A fan visual novel where you join Nana at Japari Park as new caretaker. Fun and food await in adventures with an energetic serval cat and an always hungry fox!

name: A Rocket's Intensity
description: Experience high-speed, multiplayer battles across various environments in this action-packed game. Use rockets to take down enemy UFOs and conquer multiple challenging levels. Upgrade your ship and unlock powerful weapons to dominate the skies and emerge victorious in this epic war.

name: Space Engineers: Automatons
description: Space Engineers: Automatons pack includes Automaton Programmable Block, Automaton Timer Block, Automaton Sensor, Top Mounted Camera, Saddle Cockpit, Emotion Controller, Warning Signs, Angled Interior Wall, Inset Light Block, Pipework Block, Access panels, Air Vent Fan, Robot Helmet Skin, Plastic Armor Skin.
